NK040(thi)004:1: // gcod khrid gsal ba'i sgron me zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
NK040(thi)004:2: na mo rat+na gu ru ye /
NK040(thi)004:3: ye nas gnas lugs phyogs bral snying po'i don //
NK040(thi)004:4: mi 'gyur mi shig spros dang bral ba yis //
NK040(thi)004:5: 'dus byas ma yin rang bzhin lhun gyis grub //
NK040(thi)004:6: 'khor 'das yongs la khyab pa'i rgya mtsho che //
NK040(thi)004:7: bsam brjod yul 'das yum chen zhabs la 'dud //
NK040(thi)004:8: de'i nyams len khrid kyi rims pa 'di //
NK040(thi)004:9: ma cig jo mo'i thugs kyi dgongs pa dang //
NK040(thi)004:10: mkhas grub bla mas gsungs bzhin 'khrul med pa //
NK040(thi)004:11: las can 'ag'i bskul phyir bri bar bya //
NK040(thi)004:12: 'dir theg pa thams cad kyi nang nas zab cing rmad du byung ba /
NK040(thi)004:13: de nyid nyams su len pa'i khyad par du 'phags
NK040(thi)004:14: pa thams cad don gcig tu dril nas ston pa
NK040(thi)004:19: dang po sngon du 'gro ba gnyis ste /
NK040(thi)004:20: blo ldog rnam pa gsum gyis blo sbyangs /
NK040(thi)004:21: sngon 'gro sbyor ba'i chos kyi rgyud sbyangs ba'o //
NK040(thi)004:26: dang po la yang gsum las /
NK040(thi)004:27: rgyu la bsam nas rnyed par dka' ba /
NK040(thi)004:28: ngo bo'i rnam grangs la bsam yang rnyed par dka' ba /
NK040(thi)004:29: dpe la bsam kyang rnyed par dka' ba'o //
NK040(thi)004:30: dang po rgyu la bsam kyang rnyed par dka' ba sgom pa ni /
NK040(thi)004:31: chos sgrub pa'i rten dal 'byor gyi mi lus 'di 'grub pa la /
NK040(thi)004:32: rgyu dge ba rnam dag re byed dgos la /
NK040(thi)004:33: sems can gyi nang na rgyu dge ba rnam dag
NK040(thi)004:34: byed pa nyung bas 'bras bu dal 'byor thob pa
NK040(thi)004:35: dka' ba / bdag gis dal 'byor thob pa 'di /
NK040(thi)004:36: stong zad du mi stong bar chos rnam dag gcig byed dgos snyam du yang yang bsgom /
NK040(thi)004:37: de'i lag len du brgyud pa rnams la /
NK040(thi)004:38: yan lag bdun pa 'bul zhing gsol ba drag tu btab la /
NK040(thi)004:39: sgo gsum dge ba la 'bad par bya'o //
NK040(thi)004:41: thun mtshams su smon lam tshig nyung la don che pa 'di btab pa bya'o //
NK040(thi)004:43: sems can thams cad kyi thar pa'i sgo 'byed par gyur cig /
NK040(thi)004:45: sems can thams cad kyi ngan song gi sgo gcod par gyur cig /
NK040(thi)004:47: sems can thams cad thar pa'i khang bzang du 'jug par gyur cig /
NK040(thi)004:49: sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i btson ra las thar bar gyur cig /
NK040(thi)004:51: sems can thams cad kyi las dang nyon mongs pa'i dben pa brten par gyur cig /
NK040(thi)004:53: sems can thams cad byang chub kyi snying po rdo rje'i gdan thob par gyur cig /
NK040(thi)004:55: sems can thams cad rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos sku thob par gyur cig /
NK040(thi)004:56: sad pa'i tshe sems can thams cad ma rig pa'i gnyid las sad par gyur cig /
NK040(thi)004:58: sems can thams cad ngo tsha khrel yod kyi gos gyon par gyur cig /
NK040(thi)004:60: sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba zung du 'jug par gyur cig /
NK040(thi)004:62: sems can thams cad sgrib gnyis dri ma dag par rgyan 'dog pa'i tshe /
NK040(thi)004:63: sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan mdzes par lam du zhugs pa'i tshe /
NK040(thi)004:64: sems can thams cad byang chub kyi lam du 'jug par chu la brgal ba'i tshe /
NK040(thi)004:65: sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi chu bo las bsgal bar mi dang 'phrad pa'i tshe /
NK040(thi)004:66: sems can thams cad 'phags pa'i gdam ngag dang 'phrad par snod stong pa mthong ba'i tshe /
NK040(thi)004:67: skyon stong par gong ba mthong ba'i tshe /
NK040(thi)004:68: yon tan gyi gong bar chos 'chad pa mthong ba'i tshe /
NK040(thi)004:69: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba
NK040(thi)004:70: mthong ba dang thos par skye bo gdug pa can
NK040(thi)004:71: bye ba dang tshar gcod pa'i tshe /
NK040(thi)004:72: bdud dang phyi nas brgol ba 'joms par phan tshun gtam brjod pa nyan pa'i tshe /
NK040(thi)004:73: chos kyi gtam gyis bdag gzhan gyi yid bde bar ces sogs rigs pas spyod /
NK040(thi)004:74: yang na gnod byed 'dis bdag gis byang chub kyi
NK040(thi)004:75: sems sbyang ba'i grogs byas pas bla ma ltar bka'
NK040(thi)004:77: yang gzhan sdug bsngal ba mthong na yang /
NK040(thi)004:78: de ma thag tu bdag la blang zhing /
NK040(thi)004:79: rang ngam gzhan la nyon mongs drag po skyes na'ang /
NK040(thi)004:80: gzhan gyi nyon mongs pa thams cad bdag la 'dus
NK040(thi)004:81: par gyur cig snyam du zhe thag pa nas bsam
NK040(thi)004:82: mo // rkyen ngan lam du bya thabs 'di /
NK040(thi)004:83: thams cad kyi re dog nyid 'gog pa yin /
NK040(thi)004:84: mthar thug re dog gnyis dang bral ba'i lam la skyol ba yang /
NK040(thi)004:85: da lta'i dus su dgra zan gnyis su byas nas sbyong ba yin /
NK040(thi)004:87: ces glang ri thang bas gsungs so //
NK040(thi)004:88: dge ba dag kyang ma byas shing //
NK040(thi)004:89: sdig pa dag kyang nyer bsag na //
NK040(thi)004:90: bskal pa bye ba brgya yang ni //
NK040(thi)004:93: 'dir lung khong ma smos pa rnams ni /
NK040(thi)004:94: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug par 'byung ba yin par shes par bya'o //
NK040(thi)004:95: gnyis pa ngo bo'i grangs la bsam kyang rnyed dka' ba ni /
NK040(thi)004:96: dal ba brgyad dang 'byor pa bcu tshang ba'i lus 'di rnyed par dka' ste /
NK040(thi)004:98: ngan song ni sa'i rdul dang /
NK040(thi)004:99: mtho ris ni sen mo'i rdul tsam mo zhes gsungs pa dang /
NK040(thi)004:100: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod las /
NK040(thi)004:101: shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam gcig gi so na thams cad mkhyen pas gzigs la /
NK040(thi)004:102: gzhan gyi mi mthong ba'i sems can ni stong gsum
NK040(thi)004:103: gyi lha dang mi bying la yang de tsam med
NK040(thi)004:106: dud 'gro ni chang dar mo'i sbang ma tsam /
NK040(thi)004:107: yi dwags ni kha ba bu yug 'tshub pa tsam /
NK040(thi)004:108: dmyal ba ni sa'i rdul tsam yod par gsungs na /
NK040(thi)004:109: 'gro ba gzhan la ltos na mi lus thob pa med pa'i tshod tsam yin la /
NK040(thi)004:110: kha 'thor dud 'gro tsam la ltos kyang mi lus
NK040(thi)004:111: thob pa srid mi srid kyi tshod tsam yin gsung
NK040(thi)004:112: / des na dal 'byor chud zos su mi gtong
NK040(thi)004:113: bar chos rnam dag cig byed dgos snyam du yang
NK040(thi)004:114: yang bsgom sogs sngar bzhin no //
NK040(thi)004:116: dal 'byor 'di ni shin tu rnyed pa dka' /
NK040(thi)004:118: de la dal ba ni mi khom pa'i gnas brgyad spang ba ste /
NK040(thi)004:119: mi khom pa'i gnas brgyad ni /
NK040(thi)004:122: mi lus thob kyang sangs rgyas med pa'i mun skal du skyes pa dang /
NK040(thi)004:123: sangs rgyas byon kyang bstan pa'i 'od kyis ma khyab pa mtha' 'khob du skyes pa dang /
NK040(thi)004:124: yul dbus su skyes kyang lkug pa dang /
NK040(thi)004:125: dbang po tshang yang bstan pa la rgyab kyi phyogs pa'i log lta can rnams so //
NK040(thi)004:126: 'byor pa bcu las rang 'byor lnga ni /
NK040(thi)004:127: chos dar ba'i yul dbus skyes pa dang /
NK040(thi)004:128: yul dbus su dud 'gro yang yod pas mi lus thob pa dang /
NK040(thi)004:129: mi lus lkug long yang yod pas /
NK040(thi)004:131: dbang po tshang yang log lta can yang yod pas bstan la dad pa dang /
NK040(thi)004:132: dang pa tsam 'tsham med byad pa la yang yod pas las mtha' ma log pa ste /
NK040(thi)004:135: sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byon pa dang /
NK040(thi)004:137: de'i bstan pa gnas pa dang /
NK040(thi)004:138: de'i rjes su 'jug pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis zin pa dang /
NK040(thi)004:139: snying brtse ba'i yon bdag gis 'tsho ba sbyar ba ste /
NK040(thi)004:143: 'byor pa ni mthun rkyen tshang ba yin la /
NK040(thi)004:144: rang 'byor ni rang gi rgyud la tshang ba dang /
NK040(thi)004:145: gzhan 'byor ni phyi'i rkyen tshang ba'i cha nas 'chad do //
NK040(thi)004:147: gsum pa dpe la bsam kyang rnyed par dka' ba bsgom pa ni /
NK040(thi)004:148: dper na 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgya mtsho chen po gcig tu gyur pa /
NK040(thi)004:149: de'i kha nas gnya' shing bu ga gcig yod pa phyogs thams cad du 'gro ba gcig yod cing /
NK040(thi)004:150: rgya mtsho'i nang na sbal pa long ba lo brgya
NK040(thi)004:151: brgya nas steng du 'ong ba gcig yod pa de'i
NK040(thi)004:152: mgrin par gnya' shing gi bu gar chud pa shin
NK040(thi)004:153: tu dka' ste / ci'i phyir na sbal pa long ba yin pa dang /
NK040(thi)004:154: gnya' shing bu ga gcig pa dang /
NK040(thi)004:155: rgya mtsho rgya che ba dang /
NK040(thi)004:156: gnya' shing rlung gi gang du khyer nges pa med pa dang /
NK040(thi)004:157: lo brgya lon re las mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
NK040(thi)004:158: don de ni de bas kyang ngan song nas mi lus thob par dka' la /
NK040(thi)004:161: mgyogs khrid du phyed na 'di gsum gcig tu bya'o //
NK040(thi)004:163: rgya mtsho cher g.yeng gnya' shing gis //
NK040(thi)004:164: bu gar rus sbal mgrin tshud ltar //
NK040(thi)004:165: mi nyid shin tu rnyed dka' gsung //
NK040(thi)004:167: da ni 'phros pa bshad par bya ste /
NK040(thi)004:168: de ltar rnyed dka' ba'i dus 'dir chos rnam dag gcig byed dgos la /
NK040(thi)004:169: 'dir ma byas na phyis dal 'byor rnyed pa'i nges pa med de /
NK040(thi)004:170: gal te 'di la phan pa ma sgrub na //
NK040(thi)004:171: phyis ni yang dag 'byor pa ga la 'gyur //
NK040(thi)004:173: de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba dang //
NK040(thi)004:174: dad dang mi lus thob pa dang //
NK040(thi)004:175: dge gom rung ba 'di lta bu //
NK040(thi)004:176: dkon pa nam zhig thob par 'gyur //
NK040(thi)004:178: tshe 'di'i mdun ma 'grub kyang kheb chung la slar
NK040(thi)004:179: don med du song zhing tshe 'di'i 'dod pa sgrub
NK040(thi)004:180: kyang 'grub pa'i nges pa'ang med do //
NK040(thi)004:181: chos rnam dag byed na tshe'i don yang 'grub ste /
NK040(thi)004:182: tshe 'di blos btang na rtse gcig tu nyams su
NK040(thi)004:183: len pa rnams la bde skyid snyan grags 'bad med
NK040(thi)004:185: 'dir chos rnam dag ma grub kyang sdig pa ma byas pas ngan 'gro mi skyes zhing /
NK040(thi)004:186: dge ba'ang cung zad byas pas mi lus thob ste 'ong de dus chos bya'o snyam na /
NK040(thi)004:187: 'dir sdig pa ma byas kyang thog med nas byas pa'i las da gzod dmyal bar skyes /
NK040(thi)004:188: nges par rang yang sdig pa grangs med pa gcig bsag yod na /
NK040(thi)004:189: ngan song du mi skye ba'i gdeng ci ltar yod de /
NK040(thi)004:190: skad cig gcig byas sdig pas kyang /
NK040(thi)004:191: bskal pa mnar med gnas 'gyur na //
NK040(thi)004:192: thog med 'khor bar bsag sdig gis //
NK040(thi)004:195: chos rnam dag ma byas na /
NK040(thi)004:196: tshe 'di'i snying khung su bcug pa'i kha chos tsam gyis mi lus thob pa'i nges pa med de /
NK040(thi)004:198: mi yi lus kyang thob mi 'gyur //
NK040(thi)004:200: gal te ngan song du skye na chos byed pa'i skabs med do //
NK040(thi)004:201: gang tshe dge spyod skal ldan kyang //
NK040(thi)004:202: dge ba bdag gi ma byas na //
NK040(thi)004:203: ngan song sdug bsngal kun rmongs pa //
NK040(thi)004:204: de tshe bdag gis cir byar yod //
NK040(thi)004:206: de nas thar pa yang dka' ste //
NK040(thi)004:207: de tshe kho na myong bar 'gyur //
NK040(thi)004:208: de ni rnam thar ming 'gyur te //
NK040(thi)004:209: 'di ltar de ni myong bzhin du //
NK040(thi)004:210: sdig pa gzhan dag rab tu byung //
NK040(thi)004:212: mi khams pa gyur ba nyid kyang /
NK040(thi)004:213: sangs rgyas kyi thugs rjes 'dzin pas myur du thar ro snyam na /
NK040(thi)004:214: rang gis las ngan gyis sngar yang thugs rjes bzung ba'i yul du ma gyur cing /
NK040(thi)004:215: da rung yang las ngan bar ma chad du sog na yul du mi 'gyur ste /
NK040(thi)004:216: sems can thams cad phan mdzad pas //
NK040(thi)004:217: sangs rgyas grangs med 'das gyur kyang //
NK040(thi)004:218: bdag ni rang gi nyes pa yis //
NK040(thi)004:219: gso ba'i spyod yul ma gyur te //
NK040(thi)004:220: da rung de bzhin bdag byed na //
NK040(thi)004:221: yang dang yang du de bzhin ste //
NK040(thi)004:223: bcad dang bshig sogs myong bar 'gyur //
NK040(thi)004:225: de nas dal 'byor don med du btang ba rnams ni blun pa dang bslus pa'i tshab che ste /
NK040(thi)004:227: bdag gis dge gom ma byas na //
NK040(thi)004:228: 'di las bslus pa gzhan med cing //
NK040(thi)004:229: 'di las rmongs pa gzhan med do //
NK040(thi)004:231: des na dal 'byor 'di le lo dang //
NK040(thi)004:232: rnam g.yeng gi dbang du mi btang bar //
NK040(thi)004:233: nyin mtshan med par chos la 'bad dgos te //
NK040(thi)004:234: nyin mtshan med par ma 'bad na //
NK040(thi)004:235: bdag gi sdug bsngal nam mthar phyin //
NK040(thi)004:237: rang gi chos la ma 'bad na //
NK040(thi)004:238: thar pa thob pa'i thab gzhan med //
NK040(thi)004:240: 'o na dal 'byor rnyed dka' ba'i bsgom skyes pa'i tshad rang ci tsam yin na /
NK040(thi)004:241: dge ba'i bshes gnyen spyan snga ba lta bu yin te /
NK040(thi)004:242: khong gnyid ye ma log par thugs dam mdzad pas /
NK040(thi)004:243: dge bshes rnal 'byor pas bu skabs su khams bag
NK040(thi)004:244: re la ma gzims na khams log 'ong nyen yod
NK040(thi)004:245: gsung pas / de rang lag ste /
NK040(thi)004:246: dal 'byor rnyed dka' 'di bsam tsa na /
NK040(thi)004:247: gnyid log rang mi khom zer /
NK040(thi)004:248: de la rgyal sras thog med pas /
NK040(thi)004:250: de 'dra re med kha med de /
NK040(thi)004:251: rang re ni de'i cha tsam yang mi nus par 'dug /
NK040(thi)004:252: khong gis mi g.yo ba'i bsnyen pa dung phyur dgu song zer te /
NK040(thi)004:253: mi tshe la gnyid ye ma log pa'i tshod du 'dug gsungs so //
NK040(thi)004:254: dal 'byor rnyed dka' ma thob pas chog go snyam na /
NK040(thi)004:255: gnyis pa 'chi ba mi rtags pa bsgom pa la gnyis te /
NK040(thi)004:257: bye brag du nam 'chi cha med bsgom pa'o //
NK040(thi)004:258: spyir 'chi ba bsgom pa la gsum las /
NK040(thi)004:259: dang po gzhan 'chi bas bdag kyang 'chi bar bsgom pa ni /
NK040(thi)004:260: sa steng 'dir sngar skyes zin pa mang po 'chi /
NK040(thi)004:261: phyis mi 'chi ba gcig kyang ma skyes /
NK040(thi)004:262: da ltar yang ma shi tshe thar du sdod pa dang gcig phyogs gang du brtsal du med pas /
NK040(thi)004:263: bdag kyang mthar 'chi ba yin pas /
NK040(thi)004:264: da lta nyid du dam pa'i chos la 'bad dgos snyam du bsgom pa la sogs sngar bzhin no //
NK040(thi)004:266: dbu ma bzhi brgya pa las /
NK040(thi)004:267: gzhan dag 'chi ba mthong bzhin du //
NK040(thi)004:270: gnyis pa 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid mi rtag pa rang 'chi bar bsgom pa ni /
NK040(thi)004:271: spyir stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gling bzhi gling phran /
NK040(thi)004:272: ri rab ri bran rnams kyang 'jig rten 'jig pa'i tshe /
NK040(thi)004:273: thal ba tsam yang mi lus pa dang /
NK040(thi)004:274: nam sla dgun gyi 'gyur ldog dang /
NK040(thi)004:275: nyi zla skar gsum gyi 'gro 'ong dang /
NK040(thi)004:276: nang bcud sems can gyi dar rgud la sogs pa la bsam kyang /
NK040(thi)004:277: bdag 'chi ba yin pas da lta nyid du dam
NK040(thi)004:278: pa'i chos la 'bad dgos snyam du bsgom pa la
NK040(thi)004:281: mi rtag pa bstan pa'i mdo las /
NK040(thi)004:282: nad med mi rtag lang tsho mi rtag ste //
NK040(thi)004:283: tshe 'ang mi rtag 'byor pa yang rtag ma yin //
NK040(thi)004:284: skye ba mi rtag nyid kyi nyan gyur na //
NK040(thi)004:285: 'dod pa'i yon tan dga' ba su zhig byed //
NK040(thi)004:287: gsum pa tshe la snon pa med cing 'phri ba dang bcas pa 'chi bar bsgom pa ni /
NK040(thi)004:288: byi ba dkar nag gi dpe bzhin du /
NK040(thi)004:289: bdag gi tshe 'di nyin mtshan re mos 'phris cing
NK040(thi)004:290: bsnan pa cung zad kyang med par mthar 'chi ba
NK040(thi)004:291: yin la / 'o skol rnams kyis tshe la la'i sum cha /
NK040(thi)004:294: la la'i tshe lhag ma la spyod pa yin pas /
NK040(thi)004:295: da lta nyid du dam pa'i chos la 'bad dgos snyam du bsgom par bzhin no //
NK040(thi)004:297: mgyogs khrid du byed na 'di gsum gcig tu bya'o //
NK040(thi)004:299: dang po mngal du zhugs pa'i nub mo nas /
NK040(thi)004:300: deng nas bzung ste 'jig rten 'di dag ni /
NK040(thi)004:301: lam du zhugs te lam gzhan ma gol bar /
NK040(thi)004:302: 'chi bdag drung du de nyid nye bar 'gro //
NK040(thi)004:304: da dung long yod pas rgas na bya snyam du bsam na /
NK040(thi)004:305: gnyis pa bye brag ni nam 'chi cha med /
NK040(thi)004:307: dang po tshe la nges pa med pas nam 'chi cha med bsgom pa ni /
NK040(thi)004:308: la la mngal du 'chi ba dang /
NK040(thi)004:309: la la btsas pa'i tshe 'chi ba dang /
NK040(thi)004:310: la la gog tshe 'chi ba dang /
NK040(thi)004:311: la la ni gzhon nu tshe 'chi ba dang /
NK040(thi)004:312: la la dar la bab tshe 'chi ba dang /
NK040(thi)004:313: la la rgas pa'i tshe la 'chi ba la sogs pa nges pa dngos su mthong rgyu yod pas /
NK040(thi)004:314: bdag kyang nam 'chi cha med do snyam du bsgom pa sngar bzhin no //
NK040(thi)004:316: ched du brjod pa'i tshom las //
NK040(thi)004:317: kha gcig mngal du 'chi ba mthong //
NK040(thi)004:318: de bzhin kha cig btsas pa'i sar //
NK040(thi)004:319: de bzhin kha cig gog tsam na //
NK040(thi)004:320: la la rgas dang la la gzhon //
NK040(thi)004:321: la la dar la babs pa'i mi //
NK040(thi)004:323: 'bras bu smin pa lhung ba bzhin //
NK040(thi)004:325: gnyis pa rkyen mang bas nam 'chi cha med bsgom pa ni /
NK040(thi)004:326: tshe la phan pa'i rkyen ni nyung /
NK040(thi)004:328: phan pa'i rkyen du gyur pa'ang 'ga' zhig gis kyang /
NK040(thi)004:330: nang du zas za ma legs pa dang /
NK040(thi)004:331: phyi ru khang pa sdib pa la sogs pas 'chi
NK040(thi)004:332: bar mthong bas bdag kyang nam 'chi cha med do
NK040(thi)004:333: snyam du bsgom pa sogs sngar bzhin no //
NK040(thi)004:336: 'chi ba'i rkyen ni mang ba ste //
NK040(thi)004:337: gson pa'i rkyen ni cung zad cig /
NK040(thi)004:338: de dag nyid kyang 'chi ba rkyen //
NK040(thi)004:339: de bas rtag tu chos mdzod cig /
NK040(thi)004:340: zhes dang jo bo rje'i zhal nas /
NK040(thi)004:341: gzhan shi ba rnams mthong thos na //
NK040(thi)004:342: rang la bya btang yin pas dge sbyor la 'bad //
NK040(thi)004:346: do nub ma shin song 'phro bshad par bgyi gsungs so //
NK040(thi)004:347: gsum pa nang gi lus ni mi brten bas nam 'chi cha med du bsgom pa ni /
NK040(thi)004:348: lus 'di rtsa kha'i zil pa'i chu'i sbu ba ltar mi brten te /
NK040(thi)004:349: na ning yod pa da lo shi ba dang /
NK040(thi)004:350: da lo yod pa song phod shi ba dang /
NK040(thi)004:351: khar sang yod pa de ring 'chi ba dang /
NK040(thi)004:352: de ring yod pa song nyid 'chi ba dang dngos su mthong bas /
NK040(thi)004:353: bdag kyang nam mchi cha med do //
NK040(thi)004:354: snyam du bsgom pa sogs sngar bzhin no //
NK040(thi)004:356: mgyogs khrid du byed na 'di gsum gcig tu bya'o //
NK040(thi)004:358: tshe 'di gnod mang rlung gis btab pa bzhin //
NK040(thi)004:359: chu yi chu bur las kyang mi rtag na //
NK040(thi)004:360: dbug dbyung dbug rngub gnyid kyi log pa las //
NK040(thi)004:361: sad khom gang lag de ni ngo mtshar che //
NK040(thi)004:363: gal te rgas khams kyang da lta lus sems dar
NK040(thi)004:364: la bab cing 'gal rkyen med dus ma byas na
NK040(thi)004:367: da lta 'bung gsum ma ston na //
NK040(thi)004:368: rgas shi thug nas chos byas kyang //
NK040(thi)004:369: thugs kar smas nas go gon pa'i //
NK040(thi)004:370: brang lag gi 'thab mo a tsa ma //
NK040(thi)004:372: 'chi ba byung na tshe 'di'i phun sum tshogs pa gang gis kyang mi phan te /
NK040(thi)004:374: rgyal po chen po dper na phyogs bzhin brag ri sra ba /
NK040(thi)004:377: shing gel pa dang rtsa dang srog chag thams cad
NK040(thi)004:378: phye mar 'thag cing rub rub byung na de la
NK040(thi)004:384: sman gyis bzlog pa sla ba ma yin no //
NK040(thi)004:385: de bzhin du sems can thams cad na ba dang /
NK040(thi)004:388: 'chi ba la sogs pa'i 'jig pa chen po bzhi byung ste /
NK040(thi)004:389: de la mgyogs pa sogs snga ma ltar yin no //
NK040(thi)004:391: gshin rje'i pha nyas zin pa'i tshe //
NK040(thi)004:392: gnyen gyi ci phan bshes ci phan //
NK040(thi)004:394: 'o na de la gang gis phan na chos kyi phan ste /
NK040(thi)004:395: rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na /
NK040(thi)004:396: dam pa'i chos ma gtogs pa skyabs dang mgon med do //
NK040(thi)004:400: chos pa rab gcig 'chi ba la brod ste /
NK040(thi)004:401: ma cig zha ma'i gsung gis /
NK040(thi)004:402: ma gcig 'chi ba la nga las nyams dga' ba med /
NK040(thi)004:403: nga shi ba de kun dper na ri chen po'i 'og nas thar pa'i tshod yin gsungs /
NK040(thi)004:404: de bzhin du nyams dga' ya le /
NK040(thi)004:406: blo bde 'bol le shi ba yin /
NK040(thi)004:407: de 'dra de sdug bsngal 'dod kyang mi myong ste /
NK040(thi)004:408: glang thang ba chen po sku 'das ru chas tsa na /
NK040(thi)004:409: nga dmyal bar skye bar 'dod pa'i snying thag pa
NK040(thi)004:410: nas smon lam mang po btab pa yin te nga'i
NK040(thi)004:412: da lta nga la dag pa'i snang ba 'ba' zhig las /
NK040(thi)004:413: tha mal gyi snang ba tsam yang mi 'dug gsung /
NK040(thi)004:416: de'i chos kun sgyu ma lta bu dang /
NK040(thi)004:417: skye ba bskyed mos tshal 'gro ltar rtog nas /
NK040(thi)004:418: 'byor pa'i dus dang rgud pa'i dus na yang //
NK040(thi)004:419: nyon mongs sdug bsngal dag gis 'jig pa med //
NK040(thi)004:421: tha na chos med du 'chi na /
NK040(thi)004:423: phyi ma rnams su 'jigs sogs sdug bsngal mang po 'byung bas 'jig pa bskyed pa rigs te /
NK040(thi)004:425: lam rnams thams cad 'chi bdag nyid kyi bgag /
NK040(thi)004:426: dog pa med par rab tu dga' zhing spyod //
NK040(thi)004:427: 'gro ba 'di ltar de ni gnas pa la //
NK040(thi)004:428: skye bo 'jigs pa med pa ngo mtshar skye //
NK040(thi)004:430: des na mi rtag pa bsgom na tshe 'di blos btang ba 'di shin tu zab ste /
NK040(thi)004:431: pu to ba'i zhal nas kyang /
NK040(thi)004:432: byang ser kha mi gcig na ba la /
NK040(thi)004:433: phan du re nas bshos bu btang ba la /
NK040(thi)004:434: mi gcig gis blang ba la /
NK040(thi)004:435: gzhan gyis 'phyas pas kho na re /
NK040(thi)004:436: ngan na yang ngan byang ser kha'i bshos bu rnyed pa rang gyis dang zer ro //
NK040(thi)004:437: de bzhin du mi rtag pa bsgom pa'i chos 'di
NK040(thi)004:438: thams cad kyis ngan ngan por byed cing 'dug ste
NK040(thi)004:439: / ngan na yang ngan 'di rang rgyud la skyes pa gcig mdzod dang des chog gi gsungs /
NK040(thi)004:440: mi rtag pa sgom pa'i dus su dmigs pa spos par zhus tsa na /
NK040(thi)004:441: dmigs pa spo rgyu rang med /
NK040(thi)004:446: ngo mi srung zhing mi zer la mi nyan pa gcig dgos gsung /
NK040(thi)004:448: mi rtag pa de dang po go dgos /
NK040(thi)004:449: dang po chos la 'jug pa'i rgyu byed /
NK040(thi)004:453: 'od gsal chos sku thob par byed do //
NK040(thi)004:454: 'chi ba mi rtag pa mi dran pa'i me la /
NK040(thi)004:455: chos byas kyang gnad du mi 'gro gsung /
NK040(thi)004:456: rje dag po rin po che bsgom por sgrub par byon dus /
NK040(thi)004:458: snying phyung yang sha dum cig yin /
NK040(thi)004:459: 'chi ba mi rtag pa bsgom pa gal che /
NK040(thi)004:460: de ma sgom na chos gnad du mi 'gro ba yin gsung /
NK040(thi)004:461: sgam po bas kyang de la thugs ches nas /
NK040(thi)004:463: de'i slob ma yang slob dang bcas pa yang /
NK040(thi)004:464: mi rtag pa bsgom pa 'di la thugs rtsis cher mdzad do //
NK040(thi)004:465: chos rje sangs rgyas bstan pa'i zhal nas /
NK040(thi)004:466: 'chi ba mi rtag pa 'di bshad pa po'i bshad ring ma chog /
NK040(thi)004:467: nyan pa pos nyan ring ma chog /
NK040(thi)004:468: sgom pa po'i sgom ring ma chog par byas nas
NK040(thi)004:469: chos zab mo cig kog du lus pa 'dug gsung
NK040(thi)004:470: / sga lo spyan snga ba'i drung du chos la byon nas /
NK040(thi)004:471: chos zab mo zhig thugs la 'dog par zhu zhu pas /
NK040(thi)004:472: 'chi ba mi rtag pa sgom cig gsung /
NK040(thi)004:473: des rgyud la skyes ba dog pas /
NK040(thi)004:474: de bas zab pa cig gsung bar zhu byas pas /
NK040(thi)004:475: dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'brom ston gyis slob ma byang
NK040(thi)004:476: chub sems dpa' stong dang lnga brgya bzhugs pa rnams
NK040(thi)004:477: kyang chos zab shos 'di la byed pa yin /
NK040(thi)004:478: 'di las zab pa'i chos nga la med gsungs /
NK040(thi)004:480: 'chi ba rgyud la ma dran na /
NK040(thi)004:481: chos gsang ba 'dus pa zab rgyu med /
NK040(thi)004:482: 'chi ba rgyud la dran pa na /
NK040(thi)004:483: lam skyabs su 'gro bas kyang zab pa med /
NK040(thi)004:486: 'chi ba mi dran pa'i chos ni /
NK040(thi)004:487: dpyid kha'i chag rom gyi steng du mkhar dgu thog brtsig pa dang 'dra gsung /
NK040(thi)004:488: rtog ldan sangs rgyas sgom po'i zhal nas /
NK040(thi)004:489: dam pa'i chos byed pa la 'chi ba mi rtag 'di go dgos par 'dug /
NK040(thi)004:490: 'chi ba mi rtag pa rab gcig dran na /
NK040(thi)004:492: 'bring cig dran na chos pa 'bring zhig 'ong /
NK040(thi)004:493: tha ma gcig dran na chos pa tha ma zhig 'ong /
NK040(thi)004:494: 'chi ba gtan nas ma dran na /
NK040(thi)004:495: chos pa gtan nas mi 'ong gsung /
NK040(thi)004:498: jo bo gshegs pa'i 'og tu bdag gis bsgom byed
NK040(thi)004:499: par zhu zhus pas bsgom kyang chos su 'gro ye
NK040(thi)004:500: gsungs / 'o na 'chad par zhu zhus pas kyang /
NK040(thi)004:502: 'o na ci ltar bgyis zhus pas /
NK040(thi)004:503: khyed thams cad dge bshes ston pa la bsten la tshe 'di blos thong gsungs so //
NK040(thi)004:504: btsun pa gcig rwa sgreng la phyi bskor byed pa dang /
NK040(thi)004:505: dge bshes 'brom ston dang mjal nas /
NK040(thi)004:507: jo bo la bskor ba byed pa yang dga' ste /
NK040(thi)004:508: de bas chos rang gcig byed pa mi 'thad dam gsungs /
NK040(thi)004:509: khong gis bsam pa la de bas phyag byas pa
NK040(thi)004:510: la don che ba yin snyam nas phyag byas pas
NK040(thi)004:512: de bzhin chos bshad pa dang /
NK040(thi)004:515: 'o na chos ci ltar bgyi zhus pas /
NK040(thi)004:516: tshe 'di blos thang bya ba lan gsum gsungs /
NK040(thi)004:518: tshe 'di'i bde bas dgos pa med /
NK040(thi)004:519: bde ba chung la chags pa des //
NK040(thi)004:520: chen po'i bde ba thob mi srid //
NK040(thi)004:522: sdug bsngal yod na shin tu legs ste /
NK040(thi)004:523: gzhan yang sdug bsngal yon tan ni //
NK040(thi)004:524: skyo bas dreg pa sel bar byed //
NK040(thi)004:525: 'khor ba la yang snying rje skyes //
NK040(thi)004:526: sdig la 'dzem zhing dge la dga' //
NK040(thi)004:528: bstod drag gis dgos pa med de //
NK040(thi)004:529: bstod sogs dag gis g.yeng bar byed //
NK040(thi)004:530: skye ba'i sems kyang 'jigs par byed //
NK040(thi)004:531: yon tan ldan la phrag dog dang //
NK040(thi)004:532: phun sum tshogs pa yang 'jig par byed //
NK040(thi)004:534: bla ma pu to ba'i zhal nas /
NK040(thi)004:536: tshe thung po de nyid la spyod pa mi 'dra ba sna tshogs ston pa yin gsung /
NK040(thi)004:537: rgyal po la gdams pa'i mdo la sogs pa 'chi ba mi rtag pa ston pa'i mdo dang /
NK040(thi)004:538: bstan chos mang du bltas shing bsam na /
NK040(thi)004:539: chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba 'di yin gsungs /
NK040(thi)004:540: mi rtag pa ma skyes na /
NK040(thi)004:541: chos byed lo byas kyang phal cher tshe 'di rtsam ste /
NK040(thi)004:543: snga dro mi rtag pa ma skyes na //
NK040(thi)004:544: nyi ma phyed na tshe 'di pa cha //
NK040(thi)004:545: nyi ma phyed nas ma skyes na //
NK040(thi)004:548: ci byas chos su mi 'gro gsungs /
NK040(thi)004:549: chos rje mkha' skyong grags pa'i zhal nas /
NK040(thi)004:550: tshe 'di blos ma thong na ci byas 'jig rten gyi rgyan du 'gro bas /
NK040(thi)004:551: tshe 'di'i bde skyid snyan gsum 'dod pas /
NK040(thi)004:552: kun nas slong bar song ba'i ci byas chos su mi 'gro /
NK040(thi)004:554: chos kyi bya ba mi byed /
NK040(thi)004:555: mkhas yang tshe 'di'i mkhas pa tsam /
NK040(thi)004:556: btsun kyang tshe 'di'i btsun pa tsam /
NK040(thi)004:557: bzang yang tshe 'di'i bzang ba tsam /
NK040(thi)004:558: rtogs pa mtho yang tshe 'di'i rtog pa tsam /
NK040(thi)004:559: bsgrub par btson yang tshe 'di'i sgrub pa'o //
NK040(thi)004:560: gzhan don la brtson yang tshe 'di'i byang chub sems
NK040(thi)004:561: dpa' tsam las phyi ma gar 'gro nges pa med
NK040(thi)004:562: de / de tsam na chos la rten nas slar ngan 'gro las med /
NK040(thi)004:563: de bas tshe 'di blos ma mthong na /
NK040(thi)004:564: chos pa ci byas kyang mi phan /
NK040(thi)004:565: mtshams bcad nas sgo bcad kyang mi phan /
NK040(thi)004:566: 'dag sbyar bas rdor sbyor byas kyang mi phan /
NK040(thi)004:567: smra bcad pa bas lce bcad kyang mi phan /
NK040(thi)004:568: ras gos bas gcer bur phud kyang mi phan /
NK040(thi)004:569: chu 'thung bas ltog par 'dug kyang mi phan /
NK040(thi)004:570: de ci na tshe 'di la phyi mig gis ma bltas pa'i chos cig dgos /
NK040(thi)004:571: de ltar tshe 'di rtsa ba nas blos thong na chos phyed yin gsung /
NK040(thi)004:572: tshe 'di blos thong ba'i blo skyes pa tsam gyis las ngan mang po dag par mdzad /
NK040(thi)004:573: rje btsun grags rgyal gyis slob ma dge bshes kha
NK040(thi)004:574: rag pa bya ba'i yon tan dang sku bsod nams
NK040(thi)004:576: mdze byung nas thabs sna tshogs byas kyang ma phan /
NK040(thi)004:578: nub gcig blo la nad 'dis mi khyur mi tshud 'dug pas /
NK040(thi)004:579: mi khyu nas bud ngo shes pa gcig bya /
NK040(thi)004:580: longs spyod gang yod dge phyogs su btang la /
NK040(thi)004:581: nga rang sdod kyi mo rdza 'phrang gis rdza 'og tu bya ste /
NK040(thi)004:582: lto ba lam zan la byas la ma ni bgrang snyam pa cig byung bas /
NK040(thi)004:583: de'i nub mor rmi lam la khong gtsang pos khyer ba la /
NK040(thi)004:584: mi dkar po gcig byung nas chu nang nas bton te /
NK040(thi)004:585: nyal sa bya snyam pa'i brag thog der bzhag song bas lus la chu mang po zag pa rmis /
NK040(thi)004:586: sad tsa mal thams cad chus kheng 'dug /
NK040(thi)004:587: mdze yang sang gi drag 'dug zer /
NK040(thi)004:588: mi rtag pa bcos min cig skyes nas /
NK040(thi)004:589: chos min ci yang mi byed pa cig 'ong bar 'dug ste /
NK040(thi)004:590: 'di'i nyams myong rnam dag skyes pa'i chos pa'ang re re tsam du 'dug /
NK040(thi)004:592: da lta mi rtag pa gsha' mar skyes pa /
NK040(thi)004:593: nged kyi slob dpon g.yer ba'i zhong btsun yin /
NK040(thi)004:594: de nas brag rgyab kyi gnyen ston shag 'byung yin /
NK040(thi)004:595: de nas kha rag bsgom chung yin gsungs /
NK040(thi)004:596: zhang btsun la snyung ba bag re tsam byung nas snyad 'dod yi /
NK040(thi)004:597: da res rang cha cha gsung nas ka cha phra
NK040(thi)004:598: mo tshun gzhan la bsngosa nas nga ma shi bar
NK040(thi)004:600: shi nas khyed kyi bsnom zhig gsung nas zhag re
NK040(thi)004:601: yang mi bzhugs pa lta bu'i spyod pas dus rgyun
NK040(thi)004:602: du mdzad gsung / brag rgyab pa la nyer gnas kyi dbyar shing grab byed ran gda' zhus pas /
NK040(thi)004:603: dbyar stod mi sdod cha med pas shing bu'i grab ci byed gsung nas /
NK040(thi)004:604: gzhan rtsis ye mi mdzad gsungs /
NK040(thi)004:605: kha rag sgom chung kha rag phug nag gis brag phug tu bzhugs tsa na /
NK040(thi)004:606: brag phug gi sgo na tsher phung zhig yod pa
NK040(thi)004:607: la yar 'gro mar 'gro nam byed dus na bza'
NK040(thi)004:608: 'thog pas bcad dgos snyams tsa na /
NK040(thi)004:609: de ma thag mi rtag pa tu re dran te
NK040(thi)004:610: 'di bcad nas ci byed nang du 'gro 'ong byed
NK040(thi)004:611: pa'i nges pa med snyams nas ma bcad zer /
NK040(thi)004:612: de bzhin du rang re rnams kyang mi rtag pa yang yang sgom la dben pa rer bsdad de /
NK040(thi)004:613: 'chi chis kho na byed dgos gsungs /
NK040(thi)004:614: mi rtag pa sgom pa la gzhan yang phan yon mang po yod de /
NK040(thi)004:616: mi rtag pa mang po bsgom na /
NK040(thi)004:617: sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa byas pa yin no //
NK040(thi)004:618: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis rlabs pa yin no //
NK040(thi)004:619: rjes rnams kyi nang nas glang po che'i rjes mchog yin pa bzhin du /
NK040(thi)004:620: bsgom pa'i 'du shes rnams kyi mchog gi mi rtag pa yin no //
NK040(thi)004:622: gsum pa 'khor ba'i nyes dmigs bsgom pa ni /
NK040(thi)004:623: 'khor ba 'di spyir skye rga na 'chi'i sdug bsngal dang /
NK040(thi)004:624: bye brag rigs drug so so'i sdug bsngal 'og nas
NK040(thi)004:625: 'byung ba ltar yang sngar yang dang yang du myong
NK040(thi)004:626: / da bzod yang yang myong bar 'gyur bas na /
NK040(thi)004:628: de'i rgyu nyon mongs pa spang zhing dge ba ci nus su bsgrub par bya'o //
NK040(thi)004:629: snyam du bsgom pa sngar bzhin no //
NK040(thi)004:631: de las skyes pa'i sdug bsngal ni /
NK040(thi)004:632: chos rje rang byung rdo rje'i zhal nas /
NK040(thi)004:633: mi gtsang mun khang mngal gnas nag par zhugs gyur ste //
NK040(thi)004:634: khu khrag gshang lci srin bu'i lcig lcig 'dug pa'i sa //
NK040(thi)004:635: dri ngan shin tu mnam pa'i nang du 'gre log cing //
NK040(thi)004:636: rlung 'byin mi gtsang za bar tsam yang nus pa med //
NK040(thi)004:637: 'khrul 'khor brtsir bzhin sha rus myag shing skyes pa dang //
NK040(thi)004:638: sar lhung lpags pa bshus 'dra nyi zer 'bar ba dang //
NK040(thi)004:639: rlung gis reg pas khong nas gdong pas skad 'don kyang //
NK040(thi)004:640: shin tu stobs chung dran pa stor ba bzhin du 'gyur //
NK040(thi)004:641: gnas 'dir mthong nas skrag par mi 'gyur kye ma mtshar //
NK040(thi)004:642: ces gsung pa ltar yin la /
NK040(thi)004:643: rgas nad 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal ni gzhan la ltos pas chog /
NK040(thi)004:644: tsha dmyal brgyad dang nye 'khor bcu drug dang bcas pa ni /
NK040(thi)004:646: de la tsha dmyal brgyad kyi dang po yang sos ni /
NK040(thi)004:647: de 'gro ba rigs drug gis tshig le'u byas pa las /
NK040(thi)004:648: chags dang gti mug 'jigs pa khro //
NK040(thi)004:649: mi gang mi ni gsod pa gang //
NK040(thi)004:650: gzhan yang skye bas gsod pa ni //
NK040(thi)004:651: de dag dmyal ba yang sos 'gro //
NK040(thi)004:652: gong gis phyir na lo stong phrag /
NK040(thi)004:653: mang po yang ni 'di dag tu //
NK040(thi)004:654: btags shing btags shing yang sos pas //
NK040(thi)004:655: de phyir yang sos yin par bshad //
NK040(thi)004:658: pha dang ma dang grogs dang bshes //
NK040(thi)004:659: gshin rje la ni khu byed cing //
NK040(thi)004:660: phra ma rdzun ni smra ba'i mi //
NK040(thi)004:662: gang phyir de ni shing bzhin du //
NK040(thi)004:663: thig nag btab cing sog le dag /
NK040(thi)004:664: 'bar ba'i sos ni bshag byed de //
NK040(thi)004:665: de phyir thig nag yin par bshad //
NK040(thi)004:669: rang dang lug kyang wa dag kyang //
NK040(thi)004:670: ri bong byi la ri dwags phag /
NK040(thi)004:671: gzhan yang bskyed nas gsod byas nas //
NK040(thi)004:673: gang phyir bsdus nas der dor nas //
NK040(thi)004:674: yang dag sreg par byed pa na //
NK040(thi)004:675: de yi phyir na bsdus 'jom ste //
NK040(thi)004:676: de ltar ming ni don mthun grags //
NK040(thi)004:680: 'dir ni lus can rnam dag gis //
NK040(thi)004:681: lus ngag yid gsum nyon mongs byed //
NK040(thi)004:682: gang dag lhad 'jug gzhal g.yo byed //
NK040(thi)004:684: der ni drag po'i me dag gis //
NK040(thi)004:685: rgyun mi chad par sreg par byed //
NK040(thi)004:686: gang phyir skad ngan grags 'byin pa //
NK040(thi)004:687: de phyir de ni ngu 'bod yin //
NK040(thi)004:691: gang gi lha dang bram ze dang //
NK040(thi)004:692: bla ma'i rdzas 'phrog sdug bsngal byas //
NK040(thi)004:693: gang dag gtam po 'phrog byed pa //
NK040(thi)004:695: mer bsreg la ni drag phyir dang //
NK040(thi)004:696: ngu 'bod pa yang che phyir dang //
NK040(thi)004:697: lce zhing chii ba nyid kyi phyir //
NK040(thi)004:698: de ni ngu 'bod chen po yin //
NK040(thi)004:702: nags log la sogs me btang dang //
NK040(thi)004:703: las de dag la 'jug byed gang //
NK040(thi)004:704: skyes dgu dag la me 'bar bas //
NK040(thi)004:705: rab tu tsha zhing bsreg par snang //
NK040(thi)004:706: gang phyir rtag tu mes gdung bas //
NK040(thi)004:707: drag po skye ba de'i phyir //
NK040(thi)004:708: 'jig rten du ni tsha ba'i mes //
NK040(thi)004:709: don dang mthun par grags pa yin //
NK040(thi)004:713: med par lta ba gang zhig gis //
NK040(thi)004:714: chos dang chos min log ston cing //
NK040(thi)004:715: gzhan dag la ni nyon mongs byed //
NK040(thi)004:716: de ni rab tu tsha bar bsregs //
NK040(thi)004:717: me ni rab tu drag po yis //
NK040(thi)004:718: der 'khor sems can rab tsha byed //
NK040(thi)004:719: tsha ba phul du phyin pa ste //
NK040(thi)004:720: de phyir rab tu tsha bas gdung //
NK040(thi)004:724: yon tan dag gi che ba las //
NK040(thi)004:725: gnod pa drag po byas pa'am //
NK040(thi)004:726: pha ma bla ma bsad byas nas //
NK040(thi)004:727: nges par bskal par mnar med tshe //
NK040(thi)004:728: gang phyir bde ba'i skabs med pas //
NK040(thi)004:729: de phyir mnar med yin par bshad //
NK040(thi)004:731: mdo dran pa nyer bzhag las /
NK040(thi)004:732: lus kyi las gsum rin bzhin rgyu /
NK040(thi)004:733: yang sos sogs la gsum du skyes /
NK040(thi)004:737: dge slong ma sun phyung bas rab tu tsha ba /
NK040(thi)004:738: mtshams med kyis mnar med du skye bar bshad do //
NK040(thi)004:743: thal tshan gyi chu bo rab med bzhis phyogs kun
NK040(thi)004:744: tu bskor bas phyogs bzhi'i dbang gis bcu drug go
NK040(thi)004:747: gang zhig brtul zhugs bzang mnos na //
NK040(thi)004:748: legs par 'dzin pa mi byed pa //
NK040(thi)004:749: de ni nges pa sha dang rus //
NK040(thi)004:750: 'jigs pa'i me ma mur sogs sreg /
NK040(thi)004:753: zas dang gos dang gnas khang me 'bar ba la
NK040(thi)004:754: sogs pa sdug bsngal du ma la longs spyod pa
NK040(thi)004:755: yod do // grang dmyal brgyad du skyes pa'i rgyu ni /
NK040(thi)004:757: rgyal ba la phul ba'i mar dang /
NK040(thi)004:759: shin brkus gnas khang bshig pa dang //
NK040(thi)004:760: chos 'chad pa yi gnas khang bshig /
NK040(thi)004:761: grang pa'i dus su gos 'phrog dang //
NK040(thi)004:762: chu blug pa yi grang dmyal skyes //
NK040(thi)004:764: sdug bsngal ni gangs kyis nang du gcer bu gnas
NK040(thi)004:765: la steng na chu'i bum pa shin tu grang ba
NK040(thi)004:766: mang po blug pas lus la chu bur 'byung ba
NK040(thi)004:767: dang / chu bur rdol ba las khrag rnag 'dzag pa dang /
NK040(thi)004:768: kha nas a chu zer ba dang /
NK040(thi)004:771: lus tsha la pa brgyad du gas pa dang /
NK040(thi)004:772: bcu drug tu gas pa dang /
NK040(thi)004:773: sum cu rtsa gnyis la sogs par gas kyang 'chi mi nyen pa'o //
NK040(thi)004:775: 'di na nyin gcig mdung thung sum brgya yis //
NK040(thi)004:776: rab tu drag btab sdug bsngal gang lags pa //
NK040(thi)004:777: de ni dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal chung ngu yis //
NK040(thi)004:778: 'or yang mi phod char yang mi phod do //
NK040(thi)004:780: yi dwags su skye ba'i rgyu ni /
NK040(thi)004:782: 'phrog pa ser sna shas che zhing //
NK040(thi)004:783: zang zing mi 'jigs chos mi sbyin //
NK040(thi)004:784: tshul khrims srung bar mi byed pas //
NK040(thi)004:785: yi dwags gnas su bkres skom 'gyur //
NK040(thi)004:789: yi dwags rnams kyang sos kha'i dus su ni //
NK040(thi)004:790: zla ba'ang tsha la dgun ni nyi ma'ang grang //
NK040(thi)004:791: ljon shing 'bras bu med 'gyur de dag gis //
NK040(thi)004:792: bltas pa tsam gyi chu klung yang skam par 'gyur //
NK040(thi)004:793: kha cig kha ni khab mig tsam pa la //
NK040(thi)004:794: lto ba ri'i lto tsam bkres pas nyen //
NK040(thi)004:795: mi gtsang gyi nar bor ba cung zad tsam //
NK040(thi)004:796: 'tshal ba'i mthu dang ldan pa ma lags so //
NK040(thi)004:799: lus ngag yid gsum gyis 'bring du spyad //
NK040(thi)004:800: dug gsum g.yel ba'i las byas dang //
NK040(thi)004:801: mi rig ster dang byol song khro //
NK040(thi)004:802: dud 'gror bdag nyid smon pa dang //
NK040(thi)004:803: phyug 'dra song ngo ngag tu smras //
NK040(thi)004:808: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su yang gsod pa dang /
NK040(thi)004:809: 'ching du rten log sna tshogs pa //
NK040(thi)004:810: zhi 'gyur dge ba spong ba rnams la ni //
NK040(thi)004:811: gcig gis gcig za shin tu mi bzod 'byung //
NK040(thi)004:812: kha cig mu steg bal dang rus pa dang //
NK040(thi)004:813: sha dang lpags pa'i ched du 'chi bar 'gyur //
NK040(thi)004:814: dbang med gzhan dag mtshon cha rnon po dang //
NK040(thi)004:815: lcags dang lcags kyus btab ste bran du bkol //
NK040(thi)004:819: 'chi khar bde ba'i chos bstan nas //
NK040(thi)004:820: dga' shing dkon mchog mthong ba dang //
NK040(thi)004:821: chos thos chos rtog gyur cig ces //
NK040(thi)004:826: gnyen dang bral ba la sogs dpag tu med do //
NK040(thi)004:827: lha min du skye ba'i rgyu ni /
NK040(thi)004:829: rtag par g.yo rgyu spyod byed cing //
NK040(thi)004:830: sdig pa chen po ma byas pas //
NK040(thi)004:831: 'thab la dga' zhing dbyen byed pa //
NK040(thi)004:832: de ni lha min gnas su skyes //
NK040(thi)004:834: lha min la yang lha yi dpal 'byor la /
NK040(thi)004:835: phrag pa dog pas yid kyis sdug bsngal dang /
NK040(thi)004:836: 'thab pa dang lus bcad cing 'dral ba la sogs sdug bsngal mang ste /
NK040(thi)004:838: lha min dag la'ang rang bzhin gyi lha yi //
NK040(thi)004:839: dpal la sdang phyir yid kyi sdug bsngal che //
NK040(thi)004:840: de dag blo dang ldan yang 'gro ba'i yiid //
NK040(thi)004:841: sgrib pas bden pa mthong ba ma mchis so //
NK040(thi)004:845: sbyin dang tshul khrims rnam par dag pa dang //
NK040(thi)004:846: chos nyan la spro dge bcu spyod //
NK040(thi)004:847: 'chi khar sku gzugs mthong ba ni //
NK040(thi)004:848: lha yi gnas su skye bar 'gyur //
NK040(thi)004:850: sdug bsngal ni 'dod lha rnams la'ang 'chi ltas kyi zin pa na /
NK040(thi)004:851: dmyal ba'i lus kyi sdug bsngal che ba yod par gsung ste /
NK040(thi)004:853: mtho ris na'ang bde chen de dag gis //
NK040(thi)004:854: 'chi 'pho sdug bsngal nyid ni de bas che //
NK040(thi)004:856: khams gong ma gnyis la re zhig sdug bsngal med kyang /
NK040(thi)004:857: bya nam mkhar 'phur ba nges par sa la bab pa bzhin du /
NK040(thi)004:858: slar 'og tu lhung nas sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ste /
NK040(thi)004:860: tshangs nyid chags bral bde ba thob nas lhar //
NK040(thi)004:861: mnar med me yi bud shing 'gyur ba yis //
NK040(thi)004:862: sdug bsngal rgyun mi chad pa brten 'tshal lo //
NK040(thi)004:864: de las sdug bsngal 'byung tshul ji ltar snyams na /
NK040(thi)004:865: rang bzhin gyi kha na ma tho ba mi dge ba bcu po re re yang /
NK040(thi)004:866: rnam smin gyi 'bras bu ngan song gsum du 'phen par byed cing /
NK040(thi)004:867: bdag po'i dbang gis 'bras bu ni phyi rol kho na la smin te /
NK040(thi)004:869: gsod pas gzi brjid chung ba brkus pa yis /
NK040(thi)004:870: ser ba dang btsa' char 'dod log gis //
NK040(thi)004:871: rdul 'khrigs can du 'gyur ba ste sad kyis khyer ba'o //
NK040(thi)004:873: dri bzang ngan phra mas mtho dman 'bras bu can du 'gyur ba'o //
NK040(thi)004:874: rtsub pos tsha rgod can ni /
NK040(thi)004:876: dgon sdong tha chad sdig pa can /
NK040(thi)004:879: 'bras bu kha dang log lta ni /
NK040(thi)004:883: dbu ma rin chen phreng ba las /
NK040(thi)004:884: srog gcod pa ni tshe thung 'gyur //
NK040(thi)004:885: ma byin len pas nor dang bral //
NK040(thi)004:886: byi pho byas pas dgra dang bcas //
NK040(thi)004:887: rdzun du smras pas bkur pa mang //
NK040(thi)004:888: phra ma'i sa ni bshes dang 'byed //
NK040(thi)004:889: 'khyal pa'i sa ni ngag mi btsun //
NK040(thi)004:890: tshig rtsub pos ni mi snyan thos //
NK040(thi)004:891: brnab sems yid la re ba 'jom //
NK040(thi)004:892: gnod sems 'jig pa sbyin par mdzad //
NK040(thi)004:893: log par blta ba ltas ngan nyid //
NK040(thi)004:896: mdo dran pa nyer bzhag du blta ba'o //
NK040(thi)004:897: bcas pa'i kha nas ma tho ba re res kyang /
NK040(thi)004:898: sdug bsngal bskyed pa'i tshul dang /
NK040(thi)004:900: ltung ba sde lnga'i dge ba dang /
NK040(thi)004:901: mi dge ba'i 'bras bu brtag pa'i mdo dang /
NK040(thi)004:902: 'phags pa tshul khrims nyams pa'i rnam par smin pa ci yang bstan pa'i mdo dang /
NK040(thi)004:904: mdo sde las kyi me long dang /
NK040(thi)004:906: theg pa chen po'i mdo rnams su rgya cher gsung pas /
NK040(thi)004:908: bka' gdam gyi bla ma dag gi zhal nas /
NK040(thi)004:909: phan yon che ba bag re thos nas /
NK040(thi)004:911: rgyas par dran pa nyer bzhag la blta dgos /
NK040(thi)004:913: spyir rgyu dge ba la 'bras bu bde bar 'byung la /
NK040(thi)004:914: rgyu dge sdig 'dres ma las 'bras bu bde sdug 'dres ma byung ba ni /
NK040(thi)004:916: nyi tshe ba'i dmyal ba'i gnas su phyin pas /
NK040(thi)004:917: mkhar bzang po gcig gi nang na bud med rin chen mang po'i rgyan pa gcig 'dug pa /
NK040(thi)004:918: de la zas slong pas nang du bos te /
NK040(thi)004:919: zas bzang po mang po byin /
NK040(thi)004:920: de nas khri gcig gi zur bzhi na yi dwags bzhi btag 'dug /
NK040(thi)004:921: 'di pa la ci yang ma ster zer nas sgor song /
NK040(thi)004:922: snying rje nas cung zad byin pas khong tsho sdug bsngal mang po byung /
NK040(thi)004:924: 'di tsho zos pas chog na ngas ci mi ster zer /
NK040(thi)004:925: khyed rnams la khyad par 'di tsam 'byung ba ci yin dris pas /
NK040(thi)004:926: skye ba snga ma nged rnams bza' mi yin /
NK040(thi)004:927: khong tsho zhing las la song ba'i dro chas zin pa dang /
NK040(thi)004:928: dge slong zhig sgor byung nas de la thams cad drong ste /
NK040(thi)004:929: dro ba skyar nas g.yos pas nyi ma phyi mor song bas /
NK040(thi)004:931: sngar gyi lo rgyus brjod pas /
NK040(thi)004:932: khong tshos dge slong la tshig ngan smras /
NK040(thi)004:933: des khong tsho'i tshig ngan gyi rnam smin mthong zhing skye bar gyur cig /
NK040(thi)004:934: ces smon lam btab pas nged tsho 'dir skyes pa yin /
NK040(thi)004:935: de min na nga lhar skye bar 'dug zer ro //
NK040(thi)004:936: yang khang pa gnyis su phyin pas /
NK040(thi)004:937: gcig na khye'u gcig bud med mdzes ma bzhi'i nyin mo lhas mchod cing /
NK040(thi)004:938: nub mo de bzhi spyang mo bzhir gyur nas de
NK040(thi)004:939: za zhing 'dug pas gcig na de las bzlog pa
NK040(thi)004:941: snga ma smad 'tshong ma yin pas nyin mo bsdam pa srung /
NK040(thi)004:942: nub mo ma srung bas de ltar gyur /
NK040(thi)004:943: gcig shan pa yin pas nyin mo ma srung mtshan mo srung bas 'di ltar 'gyur zer /
NK040(thi)004:944: 'o na dge sdig las bde sdug 'ang 'byung na /
NK040(thi)004:945: da lta sdig can bde ba dang /
NK040(thi)004:946: dge ba can la sdug bsngal 'byung ba snang ba de rnams ni /
NK040(thi)004:947: da lta'i sdug bsngal sngon gyi rnam smin te /
NK040(thi)004:948: snga ma ci byas rang gi lus la ltos /
NK040(thi)004:950: da lta dge sdig byas pas stobs chen re tsam ma gtog phyi ma phan du byung ste /
NK040(thi)004:951: phyi ma gar 'gro rang gi las la dris /
NK040(thi)004:953: 'phags pa ka ta ya na la /
NK040(thi)004:954: rgan mo gcig gis chu lhung bzed gang phul bas lhar skyes par bshad /
NK040(thi)004:956: sangs rgyas la dmigs nas thang nas me tog gcig nam mkhar gtor na'ang /
NK040(thi)004:957: sngon gyi mtha' mi mngon pa de tsam gyis /
NK040(thi)004:959: brgya byin dang 'khor lo bsgyur rgyal thob pa'i mtha' mi rnyed /
NK040(thi)004:962: dge ba chung ngu dag la yang /
NK040(thi)004:963: mi phan snyam du brnyas mi bya //
NK040(thi)004:964: chu'i thig pa bsog pa yi //
NK040(thi)004:965: snod chen rim gyi gang bar 'gyur //
NK040(thi)004:968: ngag gis nyes byas phra mo re res kyang /
NK040(thi)004:969: skye ba mang por sdug bsngal myong bar gsung ste /
NK040(thi)004:970: dge slong ma zhig gis grogs rnams la /
NK040(thi)004:971: khyi mo khyod tshos byas pas /
NK040(thi)004:972: skye ba lnga brgyar khyi mor skyes pa dang /
NK040(thi)004:973: dge slong ma bzhud pa'i rtsig ngos dang //
NK040(thi)004:974: ka ba la ngar snabs bskus pas /
NK040(thi)004:976: ka ba lta bu'i dmyal bar skyes par gsung ste /
NK040(thi)004:978: sdig pa chung ngu dag la yang /
NK040(thi)004:979: mi gnod snyam du brnyas mi bya //
NK040(thi)004:980: me stag chung ngu dag gis kyang //
NK040(thi)004:981: r+ts+wa phung ri tsam bsreg par byed //
NK040(thi)004:983: dge sdig che chung gi khyad par gang yin snyam na sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang na che /
NK040(thi)004:986: zhes bdag gi bla ma chos kyi spyan can gyis gsungs so //
NK040(thi)004:987: de ltar sngon 'gro la 'bad pas gnad du song ba'i rtags 'byung ste /
NK040(thi)004:988: dal 'byor rnyed dka' bsgom pa'i nyin mtshan chos la brtson pa 'byung /
NK040(thi)004:989: 'chi ba mi rtag pa sgom pas tshe 'di blo'i thong snyam pa 'byung /
NK040(thi)004:990: 'khor ba'i nyes dmigs sgom pas 'khor ba la zhen pa log pa 'byung /
NK040(thi)004:991: las rgyu 'bras sgom pas blang dor la spro ba 'byung ba'o //
NK040(thi)004:993: spyi don gnyis pa sngon 'gro sbyor ba'i chos kyi rgyud yongs su sbyong ba la bdun ste /
NK040(thi)004:994: phyi pa mu stegs pa nang pa sangs rgyas gnyis
NK040(thi)004:995: shan 'byed cing dkon mchog gsum gyi skyabs 'og tu
NK040(thi)004:997: theg pa che chung shan 'byed cing /
NK040(thi)004:998: gnas skabs dang mthar thug gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa'i ched du sems bskyed kyi khrid /
NK040(thi)004:999: sgrib pa dag par byed pa la yi ge brgya ba'i sgom bzlas kyi khrid /
NK040(thi)004:1000: tshogs gnyis rdzogs par byed pa man+dala gyi khrid /
NK040(thi)004:1001: byin rlabs 'jug par byed pa la bla ma'i rnal 'byor gyis khrid /
NK040(thi)004:1002: bar chad bsal phyir h'u ring bgrang ba'i khrid /
NK040(thi)004:1003: rlung sems btsan thabs su sbyang ba la ma sgom 'pho ba'i khrid dang bdun no //
NK040(thi)004:1004: dang po phyi pa mu stegs pa dang nang pa
NK040(thi)004:1005: sangs rgyas gnyis shan 'byed cing dkon mchog gsum gyi
NK040(thi)004:1006: skyabs 'og tu tshud nges pa'i don du skyabs su
NK040(thi)004:1008: mdun gyi nam mkha'i gnas su pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la /
NK040(thi)004:1009: ma cig lab kyi sgron ma la /
NK040(thi)004:1010: grub thob gcod kyi brgyud pa rnams dang /
NK040(thi)004:1011: bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro chos skyong srung ma'i
NK040(thi)004:1012: tshogs kyis bkra dpung nge 'od thibs se bskor nas
NK040(thi)004:1014: spyan gyis gzigs thugs kyis dgongs nas bzhugs par bsgom zhing 'di skad brjod /
NK040(thi)004:1015: bdag cag rnams la sdang bar byed pa'i dgra /
NK040(thi)004:1017: thar pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa sgrub pa la
NK040(thi)004:1018: bar chad byed pa'i gdon bgegs rnams kyi thog drangs
NK040(thi)004:1019: / nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems can thams cad bla ma la skyabs su mchi'o //
NK040(thi)004:1020: sangs rgyas la skyabs su chos la dge 'dun ma
NK040(thi)004:1021: cig lab kyi sgron ma la grub thob gcod kyi
NK040(thi)004:1022: brgyud pa rnams la rtog ldan nyams kyi brgyud pa
NK040(thi)004:1023: la mkha' 'gro chos skyong srung ma'i tshogs dang bcas
NK040(thi)004:1024: pa rnams la de ltar byed pa tshar nas thun
NK040(thi)004:1025: mong ma yin pa'i skyabs 'gro dang /
NK040(thi)004:1026: yan lag brgyad pa tshar cig byed pa ni 'di skad do //
NK040(thi)004:1028: gnyan sa 'dir gnas kyi lha 'dre dang //
NK040(thi)004:1029: bdag la cho 'phrul bstan pa'i nad gdon rnams //
NK040(thi)004:1030: ma mi min ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma //
NK040(thi)004:1031: ma lab sgron khyed la skyabs su mchi'o //
NK040(thi)004:1032: rang rig ye shes ston mdzad pa'i //
NK040(thi)004:1033: bla ma rnams la skyabs su dngos grub nges par ster mdzad pa'i //
NK040(thi)004:1034: yi dam rnams la brtse gdung dam tshig ldan mdzad pa //
NK040(thi)004:1035: mkha' 'gro rnams la bgegs dang bar chad zhi mdzad pa'i //
NK040(thi)004:1036: chos skyong rnams la spang rtog phun sum tshogs pa yi //
NK040(thi)004:1037: sangs rgyas rnams la zhi gyur 'dod chags bral ba yi //
NK040(thi)004:1038: dam chos rnams la gang la phul ba'i don che ba'i //
NK040(thi)004:1039: dge 'dun rnams la gzhon nu'i mdzes tshul yon tan ldan //
NK040(thi)004:1040: 'jam pa'i dbyangs la nges par snying rje bskyed pa yi //
NK040(thi)004:1041: spyan ras gzigs la mthu stobs chen po gdug pa 'dul //
NK040(thi)004:1042: rdo rje bsnams la ci srid snying po byang chub bar //
NK040(thi)004:1043: khyed rnams la ni skyabs su mchi'o //
NK040(thi)004:1044: khyed rnams la ni gsol ba 'debs //
NK040(thi)004:1045: khyed rnams la ni rten baca'o //
NK040(thi)004:1047: phung po lnga por mchod par bzhes //
NK040(thi)004:1048: sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags //
NK040(thi)004:1049: 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang //
NK040(thi)004:1050: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor du gsol //
NK040(thi)004:1052: dge des sems can bde gyur cig /
NK040(thi)004:1053: rdzogs sangs rgyas par sems bskyed do //
NK040(thi)004:1055: ma cig gis mdzad pa'i skyabs 'gro yan lag brgyad pa bya ba yin no //
NK040(thi)004:1056: gnyis pa theg pa che chung shan 'byed cing /
NK040(thi)004:1057: gnas skabs dang mthar thug gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa'i ched du sems bskyed kyi khrid ni /
NK040(thi)004:1058: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems can thams cad kyi don du rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob par bya /
NK040(thi)004:1059: de'i ched du theg pa chen po'i gcod nyams su len par bya snyam du bsam la /
NK040(thi)004:1061: sems can thams cad bde ba dang bde ba'i rgyu dang ldan par gyur cig /
NK040(thi)004:1062: sdug bsngal dang sdug bsngal gyi rgyu dang bral bar gyur cig /
NK040(thi)004:1063: sdug bsngal med pa'i bde ba dam pa dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig /
NK040(thi)004:1064: nye ring chags sdang gnyis dang bral pa'i btang snyoms la gnas par gyur cig /
NK040(thi)004:1065: byas pa tsam gyis skyabs yul gyi lha tshogs rnams dgyes shing 'dzum pa'i tshul gyis /
NK040(thi)004:1066: gdan khri dang bcas pa 'od du zhu nas /
NK040(thi)004:1067: rang gis tshang bug tu thim pa tsam gyis lus
NK040(thi)004:1068: phyi nang gis sdig sgrib dam tshig chags nyams thams
NK040(thi)004:1069: cad sangs kyis dag par bsam zhing /
NK040(thi)004:1070: bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di'i mthu dang nus pa la brten nas /
NK040(thi)004:1071: bdag dang bdag gis pha ma nye du gnyen 'brel /
NK040(thi)004:1072: zas nor chos gsum gyi 'brel pa yod tshad kyi thog drangs /
NK040(thi)004:1073: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems can thams cad kyi
NK040(thi)004:1074: las dang nyon mongs pa shes bya'i sgrib pa thams
NK040(thi)004:1075: cad byang nas rnam mkhyen sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang
NK040(thi)004:1076: rin po che thob par gyur cig /
NK040(thi)004:1078: gsum pa sgrib pa dag par byed pa la /
NK040(thi)004:1079: yi ge brgya ba'i bsgom bzlas kyi khrid ni /
NK040(thi)004:1080: rang gis spyi bor pad+ma zla ba'i steng du /
NK040(thi)004:1081: h'u las bla ma dam pa rdo rje sems dpa'
NK040(thi)004:1082: sku mdog dkar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa g.yas
NK040(thi)004:1083: pas rdo rje g.yon pas dril bu 'dzin pas yum
NK040(thi)004:1084: la 'khyud pa zhabs rdo rje'i dkyil krung gi bzhugs
NK040(thi)004:1085: pa'i pang na / yum rdo rje snyems ma dkar
NK040(thi)004:1086: mo gri gug dang thod khrag 'dzin pa yab la
NK040(thi)004:1087: pa'i pang na / 'khyud cing / pad+ma'i dkyil krung gis 'khril ba /
NK040(thi)004:1088: gnyis ka rus pa dang rin po che'i brgyan pa'i dpral bar /
NK040(thi)004:1090: de las 'od zer 'phros pas bla ma dang sangs
NK040(thi)004:1091: rgyas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad badz+ra sa ma
NK040(thi)004:1092: ya dza dzah dza h'u bam hoh gnyis su med
NK040(thi)004:1093: par bstim / lus longs spyod thams cad 'bul la /
NK040(thi)004:1094: bla mas bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum gyi sdig
NK040(thi)004:1095: sgrib rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig chags
NK040(thi)004:1096: nyams thams cad dag par mdzad du gsol /
NK040(thi)004:1097: sh+r+ai badz+ra he ru ka sa t+wa sa ma ya /
NK040(thi)004:1099: sh+r+ai badz+ra he ru ka te no pa tish+tha /
NK040(thi)004:1101: su to sh+yo me b+ha wa /
NK040(thi)004:1102: a nu raka to me b+ha wa /
NK040(thi)004:1104: sarba sid+d+hi ma me pra yats+tsha /
NK040(thi)004:1105: sarba karma su tsa me tsit+tam sh+r+ai ya ku ru h'u /
NK040(thi)004:1108: sarba ta th+aa ga ta sh+r+ai badz+ra he ru ka /
NK040(thi)004:1111: sh+r+ai badz+ra he ru ka sa t+wa +aah ces brjod pas /
NK040(thi)004:1112: yab yum gyi sbyor mtshams nas bdud rtsi bab pas
NK040(thi)004:1113: lus phyi nang gis sdig sgrib sgo gsum gyi nyes
NK040(thi)004:1114: ltung thams cad dag nas tshang bug nas lus sems
NK040(thi)004:1115: dkar mer gyis gang bar bsam zhing ci nus bzlas
NK040(thi)004:1116: so // bdag gi mi shes rmongs pa yi //
NK040(thi)004:1117: dam tshig las ni 'gal zhing nyams //
NK040(thi)004:1118: bla ma mgon pos skyabs mdzod cig /
NK040(thi)004:1119: gtso bo rdo rje 'dzin pa ste //
NK040(thi)004:1120: thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid can //
NK040(thi)004:1121: 'gro ba'i gtso la bdag skyabs mchi //
NK040(thi)004:1124: rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum zhu nas rang la thim par bsgom mo //
NK040(thi)004:1125: bzhi pa tshogs gnyis rdzogs par byed pa la man+dala gyis khrid ni /
NK040(thi)004:1126: mdun gyis nam mkha'i nas su pad+ma zla ba'i gdan la /
NK040(thi)004:1127: rtsa ba'i bla ma dang gnyis su med pa ma cig lab kyi sgron ma la /
NK040(thi)004:1128: grub thob gcod kyi brgyud pa rnams dang /
NK040(thi)004:1129: bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro chos skyong srung ma'i
NK040(thi)004:1130: tshogs kyis bkra dpung nge 'od thibs se bskor nas
NK040(thi)004:1132: de dag gis mdun du man+dala 'bul ba ni /
NK040(thi)004:1133: lpags pa phyal gyis bting pas /
NK040(thi)004:1134: dbang chen gser gyi sa gzhir gyur /
NK040(thi)004:1135: khrag chil gyi byung bas dri bzang gi chur gyur /
NK040(thi)004:1136: sha nyil gyi byung bas me tog gis chur gyur /
NK040(thi)004:1137: zo khog ri rab tu gyur /
NK040(thi)004:1139: nying lag thams cad gling phran brgyad du gyur /
NK040(thi)004:1140: mgo rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzang /
NK040(thi)004:1141: mig gnyis nyi ma zla ba /
NK040(thi)004:1142: snying la sogs pa'i nang rol rnams yid bzhin gyi
NK040(thi)004:1143: nor bu la sogs pa'i lha mi'i longs spyod phun
NK040(thi)004:1144: sum tshogs pa dpag tu med pas gang bar 'gyur
NK040(thi)004:1146: brdal khyab lpags pa'i zhing khams yongs gsal la //
NK040(thi)004:1147: glo snying sha rus khrag zhag la sogs pa //
NK040(thi)004:1148: rtsa rlung thig le'i tshom bur legs par bkod //
NK040(thi)004:1149: kha rje dbang thang dpal 'byor chus srid dang //
NK040(thi)004:1150: bsnyen grags longs spyod sna tshogs rgyan gyis spras //
NK040(thi)004:1151: rlung sems dag pas rgya chen yongs spel nas //
NK040(thi)004:1152: rang snang rnam dag bsham pa'i man+dala 'di //
NK040(thi)004:1153: skyabs gnas dkon mchog thugs rje can la 'bul //
NK040(thi)004:1154: dgyes par dgongs shing mchod par bzhes su gsol //
NK040(thi)004:1155: bzhes nas bdag la 'gro ba ma lus pa'i //
NK040(thi)004:1156: lus ngag yid gsum smin cing grol nas kyang //
NK040(thi)004:1157: bla med don mchog 'bras bu thob par shog /
NK040(thi)004:1158: lhag bsam rnam dag lus ngag yid gsum gyis //
NK040(thi)004:1159: man+dala bkod mdzes rgyan ldan 'di 'bul bas //
NK040(thi)004:1160: 'phags pa thugs rje can rnams rab dgyes nas //
NK040(thi)004:1161: 'khor ba dong sprug 'gro don mdzad par shog /
NK040(thi)004:1162: +aahmh'u gu ru d+he ba d+aak+ki ni h'u /
NK040(thi)004:1163: sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa t+wa ma ma k+aa ya
NK040(thi)004:1164: wak+ka tsit+ta man+da la p+au tsa me g+ha sa ma
NK040(thi)004:1165: ya sa mu tra s+pha ra na sa ma ya
NK040(thi)004:1166: h'u s+w+aa h+aa / ces pas mdun gyi lha tshogs rang la bstim mo //
NK040(thi)004:1167: lnga pa byin rlabs 'jug par byed pa la /
NK040(thi)004:1168: bla ma'i rnal 'byor gyi khrid ni /
NK040(thi)004:1169: rang gi spyi bor mda' gang tsam gyis steng du /
NK040(thi)004:1170: pad+ma nyi ma zla ba'i gdan la dus gsum sangs
NK040(thi)004:1171: rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo rtsa ba'i bla ma
NK040(thi)004:1172: dang gnyis su med pa'i ma cig lab kyi sgron
NK040(thi)004:1173: ma sku mdog gangs ri la nyi ma shar ba
NK040(thi)004:1174: ltar dkar ba / zhal gcig phyag gnyis g.yas gser gyi d+aa ma ru /
NK040(thi)004:1175: g.yon dngul dkar gyi dril bu g.yer ka dkrol ba /
NK040(thi)004:1176: sku la ras phrug dkar po'i ral ga mnab pa /
NK040(thi)004:1177: dbu skra sil mas sku rgyab non pa /
NK040(thi)004:1178: zhabs rdo rje'i dkyil krung gis bzhugs pa /
NK040(thi)004:1179: mtshan dang dpe byad 'od zer dang ldan pa bsam /
NK040(thi)004:1180: ma cig gi spyi bor pad+ma nyi zla'i steng du
NK040(thi)004:1181: yum chen mo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
NK040(thi)004:1184: g.yas kyi dang po na gser gyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa thugs kar bsnam pa /
NK040(thi)004:1185: 'og ma na shes rab kyi ral gri /
NK040(thi)004:1187: 'og ma na shes rab kyi po ti bsnams pa /
NK040(thi)004:1189: ral pa thor tshugs lhag ma grol ba /
NK040(thi)004:1190: rin po che sna tshogs dang /
NK040(thi)004:1191: dar sna tshogs kyis spras pa /
NK040(thi)004:1192: mtshan dang dpe byed 'bar ba gcig bsam /
NK040(thi)004:1193: ma cig gis g.yas su pad+ma nyi zla'i steng du /
NK040(thi)004:1194: sangs rgyas bstan pa'i gtso bo sh+aakya thub pa gser gyi mdog 'dra ba /
NK040(thi)004:1198: chos gos ngur smrig gsol ba /
NK040(thi)004:1199: mtshan dang dpe byad 'od zer mdom gang dang bcas pa bsgom /
NK040(thi)004:1200: ma cig gi g.yon du 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng ge zhal gcig phyag gnyis g.yas ral gri /
NK040(thi)004:1201: g.yon ut+pa la'i khar shes rab kyi po ti bsnams pa /
NK040(thi)004:1202: gser mdog can ral pa spyi bor bcing ba /
NK040(thi)004:1203: lhag ma thur du grol ba /
NK040(thi)004:1204: rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan cing dar sna lnga'i sham thabs can /
NK040(thi)004:1205: sems dpa'i dkyil krung gis bzhugs pa /
NK040(thi)004:1206: yum sras de bzhi la mdun nas g.yas bskor du /
NK040(thi)004:1207: pad zla'i gdan la rje btsun sgrol ma /
NK040(thi)004:1211: skyo ston bsod nams bla ma /
NK040(thi)004:1212: ma cig lab kyi sgron ma /
NK040(thi)004:1213: khu sgom chos kyi seng+ge pha dol pa zang thal /
NK040(thi)004:1221: slob dpon shes rab bla ma /
NK040(thi)004:1223: rtog ldan nam mkha' rdo rje /
NK040(thi)004:1224: skyes mchog tshul khrims rgyal mtshan /
NK040(thi)004:1225: mkhas btsun dz+ny+aa na ke tu /
NK040(thi)004:1226: rtsa ba'i bla ma la sogs grub thob gcod kyi brgyud pa'i bla ma thams cad /
NK040(thi)004:1227: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' /
NK040(thi)004:1228: bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad sprin gtib pa ltar bskor nas bzhugs par sgom /
NK040(thi)004:1230: badz+ra sa ma ya h'u dza dzah ces lan gsum gyis ye shes pa spyan drangs so //
NK040(thi)004:1231: dzahh+aum bam hoh gnyis su med par bstim zhing /
NK040(thi)004:1232: phyogs dus sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo rtsa ba'i bla ma nyid yin par nges pas /
NK040(thi)004:1233: rang gis kha tshig tsam ma yin par sha'i ting /
NK040(thi)004:1235: snying gi dkyil nas mos gus byed la /
NK040(thi)004:1236: khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyang rang gi 'khor du gyur par bsam zhing /
NK040(thi)004:1237: mgrin gcig tu gsol ba gdab pa ni /
NK040(thi)004:1238: yum chen shes rab phar phyin la sogs pa'i //
NK040(thi)004:1239: skye med chos kyi sku la gsol ba 'debs //
NK040(thi)004:1240: rgyal ba sh+aakya'i rgyal po la sogs pa'i //
NK040(thi)004:1241: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams la 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng+ge la sogs pa'i //
NK040(thi)004:1242: rgyal sras 'phags pa rnams la rje btsun +aar+ya de
NK040(thi)004:1243: ba la 'dzam gling skyes mchog rnams la pha cig
NK040(thi)004:1244: dam pa rgya gar la sogs rgya gar grub thob
NK040(thi)004:1245: rnams la skyo ston bsod nams bla ma la sogs
NK040(thi)004:1246: bod yul skyes mchog rnams la ma cig lab kyi
NK040(thi)004:1248: ye shes mkha' 'gro rnam lnga la khu sgom chos
NK040(thi)004:1249: kyi seng+ge la sogs skye med don rtogs rnams la
NK040(thi)004:1250: pha cig dol pa zang thal skyes mchog don 'grub
NK040(thi)004:1251: rnams la rje btsun rgya nag gcer bu la sogs
NK040(thi)004:1252: rnal 'byor 'khrul zhig rnams sangs rgyas rab ston la
NK040(thi)004:1253: sogs mkhas grub chen po rnams la sangs rgyas dge
NK040(thi)004:1254: slong la sogs tshul khrims mthar phyin rnams la sangs
NK040(thi)004:1255: rgyas sum pa ras chen la brtul zhugs grub rnams
NK040(thi)004:1256: la sangs rgyas gnyen ston la sogs chos kyi spyan
NK040(thi)004:1257: ldan rnams la ras pa chos kyi seng+ge la rnal
NK040(thi)004:1258: 'byor dbang phyug rnams rje btsun badz+ra seng ha la
NK040(thi)004:1259: dam chos smra ba rnams slob dpon pra dz+ny+aa gu
NK040(thi)004:1260: ru la rtog ldan dam pa rnams rje btsun badz+ra
NK040(thi)004:1261: sh+r+ai la 'gro ba'i mgon po rnams la rtog ldan
NK040(thi)004:1262: nam mkha' rdo rje la don gnyis grub pa rnams
NK040(thi)004:1263: skyes mchog tshul khrims rgyal mtshan la bskyed rdzogs brten
NK040(thi)004:1264: thob rnams mtshungs med chos kyi rdo rje la sdom
NK040(thi)004:1265: gsum mthar phyin rnams la mkhas grub dz+ny+aa na ke
NK040(thi)004:1266: tu la mkhas btsun dam pa rnams drin chen rtsa
NK040(thi)004:1267: ba'i bla ma la grub thob gcod brgyud thar pa'i
NK040(thi)004:1268: lam ston rnams la phan bde'i 'byung gnas rnams la
NK040(thi)004:1269: 'phags pa'i dge 'dun rnams la bdag sogs mkha' mnyam
NK040(thi)004:1271: ma rigs mun pa sang bar byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)004:1272: gzung 'dzin mdud pa grol bar byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)004:1273: sgrib gnyis bag chags med par byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)004:1274: smon 'jug sems mchog bskyed par pha rol phyin drug
NK040(thi)004:1275: rdzogs par rkyen ngan grogs su 'char ba snang srid
NK040(thi)004:1276: chos skur 'char bar stong nyid snying rje 'byung ba
NK040(thi)004:1277: bdag don chos sku rtogs par byin gzhan don gzugs
NK040(thi)004:1278: sku 'byung bar don gnyis phun sum tshogs par byin
NK040(thi)004:1279: gyis rlobs ces pas gsol ba btab nas dbang bzhi
NK040(thi)004:1280: len pa ni / lha tshogs kun gyi spyi bo nas dkar po 'od dang bcas pa byung /
NK040(thi)004:1282: dag bya ni lus kyi sgrib pa dag /
NK040(thi)004:1283: thob bya ni sku bum pa'i dbang thob /
NK040(thi)004:1284: yang lha tshogs rnams kyi mgrin pa nas +aahdamara po 'od zer dang bcas pa byung /
NK040(thi)004:1285: bdag gis mgrin par thim pas /
NK040(thi)004:1286: dag bya ni ngag gi sgrib pa dag /
NK040(thi)004:1287: thob bya ni gsang ba'i dbang thob /
NK040(thi)004:1288: yang lha tshogs rnams kyi thugs ka nas h'u mthing ka 'od zer dang bcas pa byung /
NK040(thi)004:1289: bdag gis thugs kar thim pas /
NK040(thi)004:1290: dag bya ni yid kyi sgrib pa dag /
NK040(thi)004:1291: thob bya ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang thob /
NK040(thi)004:1292: yang lha tshogs rnams kyis gnas gsum nas /
NK040(thi)004:1293: +aahmh'u gsum dus cig tu byung bas /
NK040(thi)004:1294: bdag gis gnas gsum du dus gcig thim nas /
NK040(thi)004:1295: dag bya ni lus ngag yid gsum tha dad du 'dzin pa'i sgrib pa dag /
NK040(thi)004:1296: thob bya ni tshig dbang rin po che thob par bsam zhing /
NK040(thi)004:1298: de nas lha tshogs rnams kyang rtsa ba'i bla ma la bstim zhing /
NK040(thi)004:1299: rtsa ba'i bla ma spyi gtsug tshang bug nas mar byung /
NK040(thi)004:1300: snying pad+ma 'dab brgyad kyi steng du sku tshon gang
NK040(thi)004:1301: ba tsam la spyan khra zim me thugs dga' ya
NK040(thi)004:1302: le / zhal 'dzum mu le ba de la shes
NK040(thi)004:1303: pa gtad cing snying dbus a wa d+hu ti'i gzhal
NK040(thi)004:1304: le / yas su / mtshan ldan rtsa ba'i bla ma la gsol ba 'debs /
NK040(thi)004:1305: sku lnga lhun gyis grub par byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)004:1307: de nas bla ma de yang 'od du zhu nas /
NK040(thi)004:1308: rang gi lus ngag yid gsum dang /
NK040(thi)004:1309: bla ma'i sku gsung thugs dang dbyer med du gyur pa'i ngang nas /
NK040(thi)004:1310: 'das ma 'ongs da lta'i rtog pa gang gis yang ma slad pa'i ngang du rang sar bzhag go //
NK040(thi)004:1311: rjes dge ba'i rtsa ba bla med du bsngo ba ni /
NK040(thi)004:1312: smon lam rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum gang rung ba bya'o //
NK040(thi)004:1313: drug pa bar chad bsal phyir h'u ring bsgrang ba'i khrid kyi thang ka ni /
NK040(thi)004:1314: 'og gi dngos gzhi'i skabs su zhi ba dang drag
NK040(thi)004:1315: po'i gcod khrid ston pa de nyid du gsal lo
NK040(thi)004:1316: // bdun pa rlung sems btsan thabs su sbyong ba la /
NK040(thi)004:1317: ma bsgom pho ba'i khrid kyi thang ka ni /
NK040(thi)004:1318: skabs skabs na dbyings rigs bsre ba'i dus su gsal lo //
NK040(thi)004:1319: de yan chad kyi sbyor ba sngon 'gro'i chos de song /
NK040(thi)004:1320: spyi don gnyis pa dngos gzhi'i nyams len gyi rim pa la gsum ste /
NK040(thi)004:1321: blo tha mal rnam rtog gi spros pa gcod pa phyi'i gcod /
NK040(thi)004:1322: blo 'bring rig pa la dbang bsgyur ba dran pa nang gi gcod /
NK040(thi)004:1323: blo rab chos nyid kyi lta ba rtog pa gsang ba'i gcod do //
NK040(thi)004:1329: dang po zhi ba'i gcod ni /
NK040(thi)004:1330: rang gis spyi gtsug du ma cig lab kyi sgron ma sku mdog dkar mo /
NK040(thi)004:1331: dbu skra sil mas sku rgyab non pa /
NK040(thi)004:1332: phyag g.yas pas d+aa ma ru dang g.yon pas dril bu skur bstan pa /
NK040(thi)004:1333: 'od kyis rang bzhin du bzhugs pa /
NK040(thi)004:1334: de la brgyud pa'i bla ma rnams dang /
NK040(thi)004:1335: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bskor bar bsam /
NK040(thi)004:1336: ma cig gi thugs ka nas 'od zer 'phros pas /
NK040(thi)004:1337: gnod byed gzhi bdag gis gtsos byas pa'i bgegs rigs
NK040(thi)004:1338: stong phrag brgyad cu la sogs nam mkha' dang mnyam
NK040(thi)004:1339: pa'i sems can thams cad dad cing mos pa'i tshul
NK040(thi)004:1341: rang gi gsol ba ci tsam btab pa tsam gyis /
NK040(thi)004:1342: de rnams kyis kyang gsol ba btab par bsam /
NK040(thi)004:1344: rang gis thugs kar rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo
NK040(thi)004:1345: thig le dkar po bya ma sar gyi sgong nga
NK040(thi)004:1346: tsam cig / tshangs pa'i bu ga nas tal gyi
NK040(thi)004:1347: bud nas ma cig gi thugs kar thim par bsam
NK040(thi)004:1348: tsam cig / zhing / ma cig nam mkha' la 'ja' yal ba dang du mnyam la /
NK040(thi)004:1349: rang gi lus kyi lpags pa de rin po che'i snod yangs shing rgya che ba'i nang du /
NK040(thi)004:1350: sha rus khrag gsum ltem gyi zhu nas /
NK040(thi)004:1351: bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho dkar chil gyis gang bar bsam /
NK040(thi)004:1352: de'i phud bla ma dkon mchog /
NK040(thi)004:1354: ma cig lab sgron la sogs grub thob gcod kyi
NK040(thi)004:1355: rgyud pa mkha' 'gro chos skyong srung ma rnams la
NK040(thi)004:1356: 'bul / de nas yon tan rigs drug gnod byed lan chags rnams la rim gyis phul bas /
NK040(thi)004:1357: mnyes shing tshim nas bla med sangs rgyas thob par bsam /
NK040(thi)004:1358: phata dmigs med ngang la bzhag /
NK040(thi)004:1360: de'i rjes la zhi drag spel ma'i gcod ston pa ni /
NK040(thi)004:1361: de yang rang gi spyi bor pad zla'i steng du /
NK040(thi)004:1362: ma cig lab sgron sku mdog dkar la dmar ba'i mdangs can /
NK040(thi)004:1363: spyan tsa cung zad dmar ba /
NK040(thi)004:1364: dbu skra sil mas sku rgyab non pa /
NK040(thi)004:1366: g.yon pas dril bu sku la brten nas gar thabs su bzhugs pa /
NK040(thi)004:1367: de la brgyud pa'i bla ma rnams kyis bskor nas bzhugs par bsam /
NK040(thi)004:1368: de nas ma cig gis thugs ka nas 'od zer sna tshogs phyogs bcur 'phros pas /
NK040(thi)004:1369: snang srid kyi lha 'dre rnams 'od zer gyi sna la rang dbang med par 'dus par bsam /
NK040(thi)004:1370: de rnams kyi srog gi snying po phyag rgya'i bar du bcug nas /
NK040(thi)004:1371: dad mos kyi tshul du gsol ba btab par bsam /
NK040(thi)004:1372: srog gi snying po la 'od zer gnad du zug
NK040(thi)004:1373: pas bka' la nyan cing chos dge ba'i mthun 'gyur
NK040(thi)004:1374: byed par khas blang bar bsam /
NK040(thi)004:1375: de nas phata byas pas rang gis rnam par shes
NK040(thi)004:1376: pa spyi bo tal gyi bud nas ma cig gi
NK040(thi)004:1377: thugs kar thim / ma cig nam mkhar yal ba dang dus mnyam la /
NK040(thi)004:1378: rang gis lus po de thar gyi song nas /
NK040(thi)004:1380: 'dod pa'i yon tan dpag tu med par gyur nas /
NK040(thi)004:1381: so so rang rang gi gang 'dod pas tshim nas bla med sangs rgyas thob par bsam /
NK040(thi)004:1382: de nas phata brjod pas mnyam par bzhag par bya'o //
NK040(thi)004:1383: bsngo ba dang smon lam btab /
NK040(thi)004:1384: de nas drag po'i gcod byed par 'dod pas /
NK040(thi)004:1385: spyi bor ma cig sku mdog dmar smug g.yas d+aa ma ru /
NK040(thi)004:1386: g.yon dril bu skur brten pa /
NK040(thi)004:1387: dbu skra sil bur grol ba /
NK040(thi)004:1388: cung zad khros pa zhig bsam /
NK040(thi)004:1389: de'i thugs ka nas 'od zer sngon po lcags kyu'i dbyibs can 'phros pas /
NK040(thi)004:1390: rang gdon dang gnyan sa'i gdon gyis gtso byas pa'i bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu /
NK040(thi)004:1391: snang srid kyi lha 'dre rnams kyi snying dkar nag
NK040(thi)004:1392: mtshams su zug nas rang dbang med par 'dus par
NK040(thi)004:1393: bsam / gsol ba drag tu btab /
NK040(thi)004:1395: rnam shes ma cig la thim pas /
NK040(thi)004:1396: ma cig nam mkha' la 'ja' yal ba dang dus mnyam du /
NK040(thi)004:1397: rang gi lus po sgang rlon brag la brgyab pa bzhin du /
NK040(thi)004:1398: sha khrag dmar nyil gyi song nas thams cad mnyes shing tshim par bsam /
NK040(thi)004:1399: de ni mtha' gtad dang bros bkug kyang yin no //
NK040(thi)004:1400: bzhi pa rtsa rlung thig le'i gcod ni /
NK040(thi)004:1401: stong pa nyid kyi ngang las pad+ma dang zla ba'i
NK040(thi)004:1402: steng du rang nyid ma cig lab kyi sgron ma
NK040(thi)004:1404: dbu skra sil mas sku rgyab non pa /
NK040(thi)004:1406: g.yon dril bu g.yer kha 'dzin pa /
NK040(thi)004:1407: 'od kyi rang bzhin du bzhugs par bsam /
NK040(thi)004:1408: de'i nang du rtsa gsum shel gyi sbu gu lta bu /
NK040(thi)004:1409: gsal la stong pa drang shad de yod par bsam /
NK040(thi)004:1410: mar sne gsang gnas su zug nas /
NK040(thi)004:1411: yar sne tshang bug tu zug pa ra la ra
NK040(thi)004:1412: sa ni sna bug gnyis nas zug pa gang gis
NK040(thi)004:1413: kyang ma sgrib pa dwangs sang nge ba gcig bsam
NK040(thi)004:1414: / rtsa gsum 'dus mdor nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du /
NK040(thi)004:1415: thig le dmar po lung thang gi rdog ma tsam gcig bsam /
NK040(thi)004:1416: thig le de yang kha dog dmar ba /
NK040(thi)004:1419: rnam pa gsal lam me ba gcig tu bsam /
NK040(thi)004:1420: thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nya gang ba nag po'i ra ri med pa /
NK040(thi)004:1421: 'od kyi rang bzhin dkar lam me ba gcig bsam /
NK040(thi)004:1422: de'i steng du thig le dkar po lang tong gi rnam pa tsam gcig bsam /
NK040(thi)004:1423: thig le de yang kha dog dkar po reg bya 'jam pa /
NK040(thi)004:1425: rnam pa gsal ba hri le ba gcig bsam /
NK040(thi)004:1426: de nas rlung lan gsum 'bud pa'i dus su rang
NK040(thi)004:1427: gis bde ba dang byin rlabs dpag tu med pa
NK040(thi)004:1428: / khams gsum sems can thams cad la phog pas /
NK040(thi)004:1429: de rnams kyi las dang nyon mongs pa'i sdig sgrib thams cad song gi dag nas /
NK040(thi)004:1430: bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas thob par bsam /
NK040(thi)004:1431: de nas rlung tshur 'then pa'i dus su sems can
NK040(thi)004:1432: thams cad kyis las dang nyon mongs pa'i sdig sgrib
NK040(thi)004:1433: thams cad rlung dang 'grogs nas rang gis sna bug
NK040(thi)004:1434: gnyis nas zhugs pas rtsa ro rkyang gnyis kyi nang
NK040(thi)004:1436: gsang gnas kyi thig le dmar po la thim par bsam /
NK040(thi)004:1438: thig le dmar po ye shes kyi me 'bar bas /
NK040(thi)004:1439: lte ba snying kha mgrin pa spyi bor 'u ru ru 'bar bas /
NK040(thi)004:1440: bdag dang sems can gyi nyon mongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa /
NK040(thi)004:1441: sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad seng gi tshig
NK040(thi)004:1442: nas bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas thob par bsam
NK040(thi)004:1444: gsang gnas kyi thig le nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang
NK040(thi)004:1445: bcas pa snying kha nas yar byung bas nyi zla
NK040(thi)004:1446: ga'u kha sbyor gyi tshul du yod par bsam /
NK040(thi)004:1447: de'i nang du thig le dkar dmar gnyis g.yas g.yon
NK040(thi)004:1448: du gcig gi gcig la reg tsam byed pa la
NK040(thi)004:1449: brten nas rang gi lus ngag yid gsum bde ldem
NK040(thi)004:1451: de nas 'jog pa'i dus su thig le dkar dmar
NK040(thi)004:1452: nyi zla dang bcas pa dkrug gi 'dres pas lus
NK040(thi)004:1453: la thim / lus kyang 'ja' tshon sna lnga'i tshul
NK040(thi)004:1454: du nam mkha' la yal nas stong sangs kyis song
NK040(thi)004:1455: la thim / bar bsam / de nas mnyam par bzhag go //
NK040(thi)004:1459: rtsa rlung thig le'i gcod bzhis phyi'i gcod song ba des /
NK040(thi)004:1460: tha ma rnams rtog spros pa'i gcod bya ba yin no //
NK040(thi)004:1461: gnyis pa blo 'bring pos rig pa la dbang bskur ba nang gi gcod khrid la gnyis ste /
NK040(thi)004:1462: sems mi gnas pa gnas pa'i thabs /
NK040(thi)004:1463: gnas pa bog 'don par byed pa'i thabs kyi sems tshol ngo sprod byed pa'o //
NK040(thi)004:1465: mtshan bcas kyi gnas thabs dang /
NK040(thi)004:1466: mtshan med kyis gnas thabs so //
NK040(thi)004:1467: dang po la mtshan bcas ni /
NK040(thi)004:1468: mthing thog la dngul gyi a gzab du bris la shing la skyon /
NK040(thi)004:1469: mdun du 'dam gang gi sar gzugs la /
NK040(thi)004:1470: lus rnam snang gi chos bdun ni /
NK040(thi)004:1475: mchu dang so rang sar bzhag /
NK040(thi)004:1477: lce rkan dang so la reg tsam bya'o //
NK040(thi)004:1478: de nas mig gnyis +aa la gtad /
NK040(thi)004:1479: rim gyis mi blta gcig char du blta /
NK040(thi)004:1480: bye brag tu mi lta spyi la blta /
NK040(thi)004:1481: khab mig tu rkud pa 'dzud pa bzhin byed /
NK040(thi)004:1482: snga rab 'das pa'i rjes mi sngar byas bag chags nyag ring bas bcad /
NK040(thi)004:1483: phyi rab 'ongs ba'i mdun mi bsu //
NK040(thi)004:1490: chu gsum 'brug kyang rang bab la bzhag /
NK040(thi)004:1491: de nas rig pa zin rtags 'byung /
NK040(thi)004:1494: thod rgal du ngu ba dang /
NK040(thi)004:1495: dran med du rnam rtog rgyun chad pa dang /
NK040(thi)004:1496: g.yo med du ri dang nam mkha' med pa lta bu dang /
NK040(thi)004:1497: byis phrug la ser bu phog pa lta bu dang /
NK040(thi)004:1498: ru sbal mkhar gzhong du bzhag pa lta bu 'byung /
NK040(thi)004:1501: dal tsam klod nas ngal bso zhing /
NK040(thi)004:1504: ro stod bsing zhing ha phata bya /
NK040(thi)004:1505: gang la gtad pa'i dmigs pa la /
NK040(thi)004:1506: gzhan du mi 'phro bar rtsen ne gnas na /
NK040(thi)004:1507: mtshan bcas kyi sems 'dzin mi 'phro ba'i tshad yin no //
NK040(thi)004:1508: gnyis pa mtshan med kyis gnas thabs ni /
NK040(thi)004:1510: gnas lugs bsgom pa'i bzhag thabs ni /
NK040(thi)004:1511: lha khang nang gis 'der so bzhin /
NK040(thi)004:1513: mi sgom mi sems mi yeng ltar //
NK040(thi)004:1514: rang lus gar bde 'dug nas ni //
NK040(thi)004:1515: mi bsam ma bsam ma yeng par //
NK040(thi)004:1516: ma bcos lhun gyis grub par zhog /
NK040(thi)004:1518: lus gnad bca' gzhi gong dang 'dra //
NK040(thi)004:1519: mig ni bar snang du gtad la //
NK040(thi)004:1520: mi mtho mi dma' rgyang mi ring //
NK040(thi)004:1521: mdung gang gi so la rig pa gtad //
NK040(thi)004:1522: g.yo 'gul med par me re bzhag /
NK040(thi)004:1523: rtag dpyad mi btang had de bzhag /
NK040(thi)004:1524: lus ni ro'i tshul du bzhag /
NK040(thi)004:1525: bdag po med pa'i tshul du bzhag /
NK040(thi)004:1526: sems ni nam mkha'i tshul du bzhag /
NK040(thi)004:1527: bar snang stong pa'i gong bzhin du //
NK040(thi)004:1528: sems la rtog dpyod kyi bya ba gang yang mi byed par //
NK040(thi)004:1529: rig pa had de phyad de bzhag go //
NK040(thi)004:1530: mkhas pas nor lug skyongs ba bzhin du //
NK040(thi)004:1531: shes pa sdug btsir mi byed par //
NK040(thi)004:1532: lhod de 'bol le shig se bzhag go //
NK040(thi)004:1533: rlung gis ma spyod pa'i mar me lta bu /
NK040(thi)004:1534: rtse gcig gis ngang las seng nge ye re bzhag go //
NK040(thi)004:1535: dran pa'i rnam rtog ci skyes zhing mtshan ma'i long long ci shar yang /
NK040(thi)004:1536: de ka ma bcos rang sar klod la bzhag go //
NK040(thi)004:1537: mdor na gang shar ba'i ngo bo de nyid ma
NK040(thi)004:1538: spang mi dgag la de ka rang de rgyang 'tsho
NK040(thi)004:1539: dang bab 'tsho byed la bzhag go //
NK040(thi)004:1540: de la thun dang grangs su bcad /
NK040(thi)004:1541: thun yun mi ring ngal dub kyi rgyu yin /
NK040(thi)004:1542: mnyam bzhag bde ba'i tshe na 'phro bcad nas bzhag /
NK040(thi)004:1543: thun thung zhing grangs mang ba la bslab bo //
NK040(thi)004:1544: rjes kyi dus su mos gus bsgom /
NK040(thi)004:1545: 'gro ba rnams la snying rje bskyed /
NK040(thi)004:1546: 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal nyes dmigs thams cad bsgom /
NK040(thi)004:1547: 'khrul pa'i las la zhan pa log par byed /
NK040(thi)004:1549: snang ba bden med sgyu ma ru bsgom /
NK040(thi)004:1550: mnyam bzhag dus su ngang la bzhag ma yeng par rtse gcig tu dran pas bzung ba gces so //
NK040(thi)004:1551: des gsal la rtog pa med pa'i ngo bo shar ba yin no //
NK040(thi)004:1552: de la yon tan ci byung na /
NK040(thi)004:1553: rnam rtog gnyug ma'i sems su dngas zhing snyig ma'i dran rtog rang sar dag nas /
NK040(thi)004:1554: zhi gnas kyi ngang la mnyam par bzhag nas /
NK040(thi)004:1555: lhag mthong gi 'od gsal ngang gi 'char ba yin no //
NK040(thi)004:1556: de la bying rgod kyi geg byung na /
NK040(thi)004:1558: lam gyi geg sel rnam gsum ni /
NK040(thi)004:1559: bying rgod lding gsum 'phrang dang gcig /
NK040(thi)004:1560: yang dog shor ba'i 'phrang dang gnyis /
NK040(thi)004:1561: btang snyoms shor ba'i 'phrang dang gsum /
NK040(thi)004:1562: bying na lus kyi spyod lam ni /
NK040(thi)004:1563: mtho gsal snang yas che bar bsgom /
NK040(thi)004:1564: ngag gi ha phata glu dbyangs len //
NK040(thi)004:1565: drag po khro bo'i lta stangs bya //
NK040(thi)004:1566: shes pa gsal gsal hrig hrig gi //
NK040(thi)004:1567: rgyal mtshan mthon po'i ting 'dzin bya //
NK040(thi)004:1568: rgod na lus kyi spyod lam bsgom //
