NK040(thi)004:1569: bya bas mig yeng gol sa ru //
NK040(thi)004:1570: dbang po shad smad zhig nas bsgom //
NK040(thi)004:1571: byang chub sems dpa'i lta stangs bya //
NK040(thi)004:1572: gting nas ngo ma shes pa'i skyon //
NK040(thi)004:1573: glan bsgom had por sgom skye med //
NK040(thi)004:1574: de la bla ma'i man ngag gis //
NK040(thi)004:1575: rang la yod pa'i sems nyid de //
NK040(thi)004:1576: lag mthil shel sgong bzhin du bsten //
NK040(thi)004:1577: de ngo shes pas grol bar 'gyur //
NK040(thi)004:1578: gzhan yang 'thor bu'i geg sel rnams //
NK040(thi)004:1579: mang gi dog pas 'dir ma bris //
NK040(thi)004:1580: gnyis pa yang dog shor ba'i 'phrang bsal ba //
NK040(thi)004:1581: yang nas phyal bar shor ba la //
NK040(thi)004:1582: yang ba med pa'i man ngag brten //
NK040(thi)004:1583: dran pa rgyun chags rtsi'i bzung //
NK040(thi)004:1584: phyal bar mi btang nyams su blang //
NK040(thi)004:1585: dog nas sdug brtsir shog ba la //
NK040(thi)004:1586: snang ba rgya yan man ngag brten //
NK040(thi)004:1587: dran pa mi dgag phyar bar btang //
NK040(thi)004:1588: dran shar rjes 'dzin med par bzhag /
NK040(thi)004:1589: shes pa mi bzung yan sar bzhag /
NK040(thi)004:1590: rig pa khyab gdal chen por zhag gong //
NK040(thi)004:1591: gsum pa btang snyoms lus pa'i 'phrang bsal ba //
NK040(thi)004:1592: thig chen tshig thog lus pa la //
NK040(thi)004:1593: mi yengs rtse gcig nyams su blang //
NK040(thi)004:1594: rang rgyud phyal bar mi btang bar //
NK040(thi)004:1595: nges par nyams myong rgyud la bskyed //
NK040(thi)004:1596: theg chen nyam thog lus pa las //
NK040(thi)004:1597: bde gsal nyams myong ci shar yang //
NK040(thi)004:1598: rtog pa'i ye shes ma shar na //
NK040(thi)004:1601: de phyir nyams la ma zhan par //
NK040(thi)004:1602: rgyun chad med pa'i nyams len gyis //
NK040(thi)004:1603: nyams rtog gcig tu 'dres chu chug /
NK040(thi)004:1604: nyams myong blo'i sprin tshogs rnams //
NK040(thi)004:1605: rtog pa'i nam mkhar dwangs su chug /
NK040(thi)004:1606: nyams myong blo'i rba rlab rnams //
NK040(thi)004:1607: rtogs pa'i rgya mtshor zhi ru chug /
NK040(thi)004:1608: nyams myong blo yi dri ma rnams //
NK040(thi)004:1609: rtogs pa'i ngang du dwangs su chug /
NK040(thi)004:1610: nyams myong blo yi bcing ba rnams //
NK040(thi)004:1611: rtog pa'i blo klong du grol du chug /
NK040(thi)004:1612: sprin dang bral ba'i nyi ma bzhin //
NK040(thi)004:1613: rtog pa mngon du gyur pa dgos //
NK040(thi)004:1614: ces sangs rgyas mnyen ston gyi khrid las gsungs so //
NK040(thi)004:1615: des sems mi gnas pa gnas pa'i thabs de song nas /
NK040(thi)004:1616: gnyis pa gnas pa bog 'don par byed pa'i thabs sems tshol ngo sprod byed pa ni /
NK040(thi)004:1617: rig pa rkyang 'ded la brten nas sems btsal ba gal che ba ste /
NK040(thi)004:1618: sems kyi phu thag ma chod par bsgom rgyu'i dmigs mi shes /
NK040(thi)004:1620: dper na nad pa'i tsa la bltas par sman btang ba'am /
NK040(thi)004:1621: 'ben ma mthong ba mda' 'phang ba dang 'dra ba'am /
NK040(thi)004:1622: bsgom byed dgos pa la bsgom rgyu rang de ngos zin dgos pa yin te /
NK040(thi)004:1624: rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni /
NK040(thi)004:1627: sems tshol lugs la gsum ste /
NK040(thi)004:1628: phyi snang thog tu tshol ba /
NK040(thi)004:1629: bar lus thog na tshol ba /
NK040(thi)004:1630: nang sems thog nas tshol ba'o //
NK040(thi)004:1631: dang po phyi snang thog nas tshol ba ni /
NK040(thi)004:1632: de yang tshogs drug gis shes pa la rkyang ded byed nas /
NK040(thi)004:1633: mig gis mthong ba'i gzugs yul snang du shar ba'i dus su sems kyi yul la phar 'jug /
NK040(thi)004:1634: yul gyis tshur la bkag bsam yang /
NK040(thi)004:1635: yul sems skad cig ma'i bsam gzugs yin /
NK040(thi)004:1636: de rnams gang yin yul sems skad cig ma'i steng
NK040(thi)004:1637: du mnyam por 'dzom yod pa thag chod par gyis
NK040(thi)004:1641: sems kyi phar bzung ba yang ma byung /
NK040(thi)004:1642: yul tshur 'ong nas sems bkab pa yang ma red /
NK040(thi)004:1643: de gnyis tha dad du yod pa yang ma byung /
NK040(thi)004:1644: tha dad du mthong ba 'di 'khrul snang byung dza /
NK040(thi)004:1645: dngos por mthong ba sems 'khrul gzugs byung /
NK040(thi)004:1646: khong gnyis ngo bo dbyer med la byed pas gnyis su snang bas /
NK040(thi)004:1647: da lta yul drug gi snang ba gang byung yang
NK040(thi)004:1648: kho rang gi rang gzugs rang rtsal rang rang rlab
NK040(thi)004:1649: byung zer na go ba yin /
NK040(thi)004:1650: gnyis pa bar lus thog na sems btsal ba ni /
NK040(thi)004:1651: sems de lus phyi nang stod smad gar snang legs par ltos byas pas /
NK040(thi)004:1652: gar tshol bas yang ma rnyed zer na /
NK040(thi)004:1653: sems kyi phyogs 'gros go ba yin no //
NK040(thi)004:1654: gsum pa nang sems thog na btsal ba ni /
NK040(thi)004:1655: khyod rang gis sems mi dran dgu dran /
NK040(thi)004:1656: sna tshogs dran pa'i rtogs pa de la /
NK040(thi)004:1657: dran dus kun dus cig dran 'dug gam /
NK040(thi)004:1658: re rer kha la rims pas dran 'dug /
NK040(thi)004:1659: yul snang sna tshogs pa 'dzin dus dus gcig 'dzin 'dug gam /
NK040(thi)004:1660: skad cig snga phyi rim par 'dzin 'dug ltos shig /
NK040(thi)004:1661: nang du 'gyu dus rig pa skad cig ma la
NK040(thi)004:1662: rtog pa mi 'dra ba dus gcig la yongs 'dug
NK040(thi)004:1663: gam / skad cig ma snga ma 'gags shing phyi ma rim par skye 'dug ltos shig /
NK040(thi)004:1664: byas la legs par blta bcol /
NK040(thi)004:1665: sna tshogs shar yang rig pa skad cig ma'i 'gros
NK040(thi)004:1666: min pa rtog pa gnyis su dus gcig 'ong thab
NK040(thi)004:1668: des sems ngos zin pa yin pas sems rig pa skad cig la /
NK040(thi)004:1669: de'i dngos po yod pa gcig 'dug gam /
NK040(thi)004:1672: dbyibs dang kha dog ci lta bu /
NK040(thi)004:1673: med pa gcig 'dug na med pa gang gis shes /
NK040(thi)004:1675: dngos po med pa shes mkhan de yin zer na /
NK040(thi)004:1676: shes mkhan gyi skad cig ma de'i ngo bo de thog ma gang nas byung /
NK040(thi)004:1677: de yang kho rang gang yang ma srid pa'i thog ma kho la byung sa e snang ltos /
NK040(thi)004:1678: bar du gnas sa e snang ltos /
NK040(thi)004:1679: gnas rgyu gcig yod na kho la dngos po gcig yod dgos /
NK040(thi)004:1680: de yod na dbyibs zla gam mam gru bzhi la sogs pa yod /
NK040(thi)004:1681: de yod na kha dog dkar dmar legs par yod /
NK040(thi)004:1682: de la yod med legs par ltos /
NK040(thi)004:1683: tha ma 'dir 'gag bya ba'i 'gag sa e snang ltos /
NK040(thi)004:1684: mi snang na med par shes mkhan rang de gang yin ltos /
NK040(thi)004:1685: lar pho tshod dang go yul min par thag chod nges gyis la shog /
NK040(thi)004:1687: rig pa skad cig ma'i ngo bo la /
NK040(thi)004:1688: thog ma byung sa med pas rang byung gi ye shes /
NK040(thi)004:1689: bar du gnas sa med pas yul yul can las
NK040(thi)004:1690: 'das nas dngos po med cing dbyib kha dog ma
NK040(thi)004:1691: grub pa'o // tha ma 'dir 'gags bya ba med pas /
NK040(thi)004:1692: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes yin te /
NK040(thi)004:1694: rnam par mi rtog dbyings mi zad //
NK040(thi)004:1696: yang sems tshol bog 'don gyi skor la brgyad ste /
NK040(thi)004:1697: dang po gnas 'gyu gnyis kyi bog 'don pa ni /
NK040(thi)004:1698: sems lhan ne gnas su chug la /
NK040(thi)004:1699: de la yon tan ci 'dug lta /
NK040(thi)004:1702: gnyis pa ngo bo gcig gam tha dad dri'o //
NK040(thi)004:1704: gnas pa ni rtog med yin /
NK040(thi)004:1705: 'gyu ba ni rtogs pa yin pas de gnyis ga la gcig /
NK040(thi)004:1708: gnas pa'i dus na 'gyu ba gang du song /
NK040(thi)004:1709: de gnyis la khyad par re ngos bzung ci 'dug snyams ltos /
NK040(thi)004:1712: gnas na yang gnas pa'i ngos bzung med cing /
NK040(thi)004:1713: 'gyu na'ang 'gyu ba'i ngos bzung med pa la /
NK040(thi)004:1714: gnas 'gyu tha dad du 'dzin pa log rtogs kyis mkhas khyad yin no //
NK040(thi)004:1716: de nas gnas pa ched du mi sgrub /
NK040(thi)004:1718: 'gyu bas gnas pa'i go chod pa'i gnad rig par bya'o //
NK040(thi)004:1719: gnyis pa rig stong tha dad la bog 'don pa ni /
NK040(thi)004:1720: rtog pa thol skyes kyi ngo bo la bltas pas /
NK040(thi)004:1723: ngos bzung med pa cig 'ong na rtog pa tol skyes pa de dang /
NK040(thi)004:1726: ngos bzung med pa de dang khyad ci 'dug dri'o //
NK040(thi)004:1729: stong pa la sogs pa ni ma 'khrul ba yin pas ga la gcig /
NK040(thi)004:1731: rtogs pa'i dus su stong pa gang du song /
NK040(thi)004:1732: rtogs pa la stong pa min pa'i ngos bzung ci 'dug /
NK040(thi)004:1733: tha dad du 'dzin pa ni dngos 'dzin gyi log rtogs so //
NK040(thi)004:1734: de nas stong pa nyid ma rtogs pa'i rtogs pa skad cig kyang yod pa ma yin pas /
NK040(thi)004:1735: rtogs pas stong pa nyid kyi go chod pa'i gnad rig par bya'o //
NK040(thi)004:1736: gsum pa dran stong tha dad la bog 'don pa ni /
NK040(thi)004:1737: gang shar la lta ba dran pa tsam gyi stong nyid du 'gro na /
NK040(thi)004:1738: dran pa dang stong pa gcig gam mi gcig dri'o //
NK040(thi)004:1739: gcig na dran pa ni ma brjed pa yin la /
NK040(thi)004:1740: stong pa la rjed ma brjed kyi dbye ba'am /
NK040(thi)004:1741: ngo bo med pas de gnyis ga la gcig ces
NK040(thi)004:1742: 'go bskor mi gcig na dran pa la stong pa
NK040(thi)004:1743: min pa'i ngo bo gcig 'dug gam /
NK040(thi)004:1744: dran pa'i dus na stong pa gong du song /
NK040(thi)004:1745: stong pa'i dus na dran pa gang du song /
NK040(thi)004:1746: des na dran pas stong pa'i go chod pa'i gnad rigs par bya'o //
NK040(thi)004:1747: bzhi pa gnas pa brtan pa la bog 'don pa ni /
NK040(thi)004:1748: gang shar ba la bltas pas /
NK040(thi)004:1749: dge sbyor sngar gnas pa lta bu bsgom byung na /
NK040(thi)004:1750: de la yon tan ci 'dug gnas pa ga la gnas /
NK040(thi)004:1751: de yan par btang ba la skyon ci 'dug /
NK040(thi)004:1753: kho dge sbyor gyi dngos po yin pa la /
NK040(thi)004:1757: blo thag legs par chod la ston zhes brjod do //
NK040(thi)004:1758: de nas nyams kyi ro la ma zhen par gang
NK040(thi)004:1759: shar kha yan gyi dag sbyor go chod pa'i gnad
NK040(thi)004:1760: rig par bya'o // lnga pa bde ba dang ldan pa la bog 'don pa ni /
NK040(thi)004:1761: dge sbyor dang ma bral ba'i dus na /
NK040(thi)004:1762: bde ba rgyun chags su byung na /
NK040(thi)004:1763: bde ba la ngos bzung ci 'dug dri'o //
NK040(thi)004:1764: mi 'dug na bde ba yid dang mthun pa yin pas /
NK040(thi)004:1765: de la ngos bzung med pa ga la srid ces 'go bskor ro //
NK040(thi)004:1767: ci 'dra gcig 'dug nga la ston dang /
NK040(thi)004:1769: des na bde ba'i ro la ma zhen par /
NK040(thi)004:1770: bde bas stong pa'i go chod pa'i gnad rig par bya'o //
NK040(thi)004:1771: drug pa gsal ba la bog 'don pa ni /
NK040(thi)004:1772: dge sbyor rnal du phab pa'i dus su gsal snang chen po byung na /
NK040(thi)004:1773: gsal ba de dang mi gsal ba de la khyad ci 'dug /
NK040(thi)004:1775: gsal ba ni sems dwangs ba'i yon tan yin /
NK040(thi)004:1776: mi gsal ba ni sems 'thib pa'i dri ma yin pas /
NK040(thi)004:1780: gsal ba la yon tan ngos bzung ci 'dug /
NK040(thi)004:1781: mi gsal ba la skyon nam /
NK040(thi)004:1783: des na gsal ba la ma zhen cing /
NK040(thi)004:1784: dwangs cha la mi ltos par gsal rung mi gsal
NK040(thi)004:1785: rung gang shar gyi nga go rjen pas chog pa'i
NK040(thi)004:1787: bdun pa rtogs med bstan pa la bog 'don pa ni /
NK040(thi)004:1789: mi rtogs pa rgyun du byung na /
NK040(thi)004:1790: rnam rtog khyad du spros nas de la skyon ci 'dug /
NK040(thi)004:1791: mi rtogs pa la yon tan ci 'dug /
NK040(thi)004:1794: skyon skyon med na 'khor ba 'khyams mkhan mi srid pas /
NK040(thi)004:1799: rtogs pa mi rtog pa gnyis la bzang ngan gyi
NK040(thi)004:1800: khyad par ci 'dug nga la ston zhes brjod do
NK040(thi)004:1801: // des na mi rtog pa'i rdzong la ma zhen par /
NK040(thi)004:1802: rtog pas mi rtogs pa'i go chod pa'i gnad rig par bya'o //
NK040(thi)004:1803: brgyad pa stong nyid brten pa la bog 'don pa ni /
NK040(thi)004:1805: ngos bzung dang spu ris gang yang med pa'i stong pa zhig rgyun du byung na /
NK040(thi)004:1806: ri dang rtsig pa la sogs pa 'di rnams stong pa de la khyad ci 'dug /
NK040(thi)004:1808: mi 'dug na stong pa ni rdul gyi chos las 'das pa yin la /
NK040(thi)004:1809: ri la sogs pa ni rdos chags su grub pa yin pas /
NK040(thi)004:1810: de gnyis ga la gcig ces 'go bskor ro //
NK040(thi)004:1811: mi gcig na ri la sogs pa 'di rnams mes
NK040(thi)004:1812: sreg pa'am phye mar btang nas rlung gis mkha' la
NK040(thi)004:1814: ri la sogs pa la stong pa nyid min pa'i ngo bo ci 'dug /
NK040(thi)004:1815: des na stong pa'i mkha' la ma zhan par snang
NK040(thi)004:1816: ba sna tshogs kyi rang sgo rjen pas skye med
NK040(thi)004:1817: zab mo'i go chod pa'i gnad rig par bya'o //
NK040(thi)004:1818: des sems tshogs bog 'don brgyad ma de song ngo //
NK040(thi)004:1819: de rnams kun gyi blo 'bring po rigs la dbang
NK040(thi)004:1820: bsgyur ba dran pa nang gi gcod khrid de song
NK040(thi)004:1821: ngo // spyi don gsum pa blo rab chos nyid
NK040(thi)004:1822: kyi lta ba rtogs pa gsang ba'i chos la lnga
NK040(thi)004:1823: ngo // ste / dang po snang bas gnod par rtogs pa'i dus /
NK040(thi)004:1824: gnyis pa phan gnod 'dres par rtogs pa'i dus /
NK040(thi)004:1825: gsum pa snang bas phan par rtogs pa'i dus /
NK040(thi)004:1826: bzhi pa de'i bzhag thab bstan pa /
NK040(thi)004:1827: lnga pa 'bras bu ngo bo bstan pa'o //
NK040(thi)004:1828: dang po snang bas gnod par rtogs pa'i dus ni /
NK040(thi)004:1829: gang gi snang ba sna tshogs spang byar long zhing /
NK040(thi)004:1830: 'og ma'i gnas pa la sogs sems tshol gyi don la nges shes cung zad skyes pa la /
NK040(thi)004:1831: nga rgyal dang rlom sems cung zad skyes shing /
NK040(thi)004:1832: phyogs gzhan la shor ba yin pas /
NK040(thi)004:1833: de nyid bsal ba'i thabs ni /
NK040(thi)004:1834: bsgom gang bzung ba'i cha thams cad sngon nas shar ba la mi zhen /
NK040(thi)004:1837: 'gyu ba la sogs gang ngan pa'i cha thams cad la mnyam bzhag gi mthil po byed cing /
NK040(thi)004:1841: gang shar rgyan du che ba'i thabs la 'bad cing brtson par byed ste /
NK040(thi)004:1842: rje dam pa rgya gar gyis /
NK040(thi)004:1843: g.ya' chu sil ma brdab cing dwangs //
NK040(thi)004:1844: dngul dkar gyi me long phyis bzhin gsal //
NK040(thi)004:1845: rnal 'byor gyi sgom pa bshigs shing bzang //
NK040(thi)004:1847: de nyid kyi dus su spros pa thams cad spang zhing spros med kyi ngang la bzhag /
NK040(thi)004:1848: g.yeng ba thams cad spang la yeng med kyi ngang la bzhag go //
NK040(thi)004:1849: 'du 'dzin thams cad spang zhing gcig pur bsdad /
NK040(thi)004:1850: grong yul spang zhing ri khrod brtan par bya'o //
NK040(thi)004:1851: gnyis pa phan gnod 'dres par rtog pa'i dus ni /
NK040(thi)004:1852: nyon mongs dang ye shes dum bur 'char ba yin /
NK040(thi)004:1853: de'i dus su ro snyom pa'i gsang spyod bya /
NK040(thi)004:1854: 'gris pa med pa'i yul du phyogs med du 'gro /
NK040(thi)004:1855: zas la 'di za dang 'di mi za med cing gtsang tsog med par kun kyang za /
NK040(thi)004:1856: gos la 'di gyon 'di mi gyon med cing bzang ngan med par kun kyang gon /
NK040(thi)004:1857: grogs la 'di 'grog dang 'di mi 'grog med cing /
NK040(thi)004:1858: bzang ngan med par kun dang 'grog /
NK040(thi)004:1859: gnas la 'di bsdad dang mi bsdad med cing /
NK040(thi)004:1860: kun tu 'grim zhing nyams rtsal sbyangs /
NK040(thi)004:1861: gdon dang na tsha sdug bsngal dang /
NK040(thi)004:1862: 'gal rkyen gyi snang ba thams cad la /
NK040(thi)004:1863: thogs su bkal la lam rtsal sbyangs /
NK040(thi)004:1864: bstod smad la chags sdang mi byed /
NK040(thi)004:1865: dga' dang mi dga' gnyis su mi 'dzin /
NK040(thi)004:1866: ro snyom gsang spyod kyi ngo bo mthar phyin par byed do //
NK040(thi)004:1867: gsum pa snang bas phan par rtogs pa'i dus ni /
NK040(thi)004:1868: snang ba sna tshogs grogs su 'char ba /
NK040(thi)004:1869: 'khor 'das gnyis ma 'dres la yongs su rdzogs pa /
NK040(thi)004:1870: sangs rgyas dang sems can la bzang ngan med pas /
NK040(thi)004:1871: lha dang 'dre la nye ring med pa /
NK040(thi)004:1872: thams cad sems su gcod pa la /
NK040(thi)004:1873: gcod rgyu gcod mkhan gnyis su ma grub na gcod pa'i mchog /
NK040(thi)004:1874: de yang gshis 'gros yin lugs kyi ngo bo la bcos ma phog na gzhi'i mchog /
NK040(thi)004:1875: gshis 'gros rang de gzhi rnal ma yin bzhin du /
NK040(thi)004:1876: yin thog na rtog na lta ba'i mchog /
NK040(thi)004:1877: de la phyogs 'dzin gyi bsgom rgyu med par gang
NK040(thi)004:1878: shar gyi ngo bo la gom 'dris su 'jug pa
NK040(thi)004:1880: 'dris gom brten gsum byed pa de'i ngo bo la /
NK040(thi)004:1881: 'di yin 'di min gyi blang dor med cing re
NK040(thi)004:1882: dog gam mtha' dang bral ba spyod pa'am 'bras bu
NK040(thi)004:1885: khyed kyi 'khor 'das shan ni bdag gis dbye //
NK040(thi)004:1887: gcig la gnyis su dbye ba 'khor ba yin //
NK040(thi)004:1888: sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su med pa la //
NK040(thi)004:1889: phye nas sangs rgyas bsgrub pa 'khor ba yin //
NK040(thi)004:1890: lha 'dre gnyis la nye ring med pa la //
NK040(thi)004:1891: dngos grub lha la re ba 'khor ba yin //
NK040(thi)004:1892: thams cad sems su gcod pa yin pa la //
NK040(thi)004:1893: gcod rgyu gcod mkhan byung na 'khor ba yin //
NK040(thi)004:1894: ma bcos pa de gzhi'i mchog yin bzhin //
NK040(thi)004:1895: gzhi la bcas bcos byed pa 'khor ba yin //
NK040(thi)004:1896: bsgom pa de lam gyi mchog yin te //
NK040(thi)004:1897: lam la bgrod rgyu byung na 'khor ba yin //
NK040(thi)004:1898: ma grub pa de 'bras bu'i mchog yin te //
NK040(thi)004:1899: ched kyi sgrub rgyu byung na 'khor ba yin //
NK040(thi)004:1900: lta ba 'gyur ba med pa yin pa la //
NK040(thi)004:1901: rtag chad gnyis su byung na 'khor ba yin //
NK040(thi)004:1902: bsgom pa gsal stong 'dzin med yin pa la //
NK040(thi)004:1903: bying rgod gnyis su byung na 'khor ba yin //
NK040(thi)004:1904: spyod pa khyab gdal chen po yin pa la //
NK040(thi)004:1905: dgag sgrub gnyis su byung na 'khor ba yin //
NK040(thi)004:1906: 'bras bu rnam par dag pa yin la //
NK040(thi)004:1907: re dog gnyis su byung na 'khor ba yin //
NK040(thi)004:1908: 'khor 'das gnyis 'dzin bar na sangs rgyas ga la yod //
NK040(thi)004:1910: de la nyams su blang bar dang /
NK040(thi)004:1911: sa lam bgrod mi dgos zer ba ni ma yin no //
NK040(thi)004:1920: gzhi thog 'jog pas sa lam rdzogs //
NK040(thi)004:1921: man ngag gzhan las khyad par 'phags //
NK040(thi)004:1923: gzhi lam 'bras bu'i ngo bo ngos bzung ba ni /
NK040(thi)004:1925: skye ba med pa sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa /
NK040(thi)004:1926: ngo bo ka dag de rang la rang chas su bzhugs nas yod pa de gzhi /
NK040(thi)004:1927: de'i ngang la ma bcos par sing nge 'dug pa de lam /
NK040(thi)004:1928: de la 'gyur ba med pa rten pa thob pa de 'bras bu yin no //
NK040(thi)004:1930: gang snang gang shar gang byung kho rang min pa'i bzo bcos mi byed /
NK040(thi)004:1931: rkyen bzang ngan ci byung yang de ka min pa mi bsgom /
NK040(thi)004:1932: kho rang gang yin pa de la dge sbyor gyi dngos po byed pa'o //
NK040(thi)004:1934: gang byung de ka min pa mi lta /
NK040(thi)004:1935: de ka min pa mi bsgom /
NK040(thi)004:1936: de ka min pa ci yang yid la mi byed do //
NK040(thi)004:1938: gang shar gyis chog zer ba gnyis 'gal bas de'i gnad rig par bya'o //
NK040(thi)004:1940: ma gcig gis ka tshom las /
NK040(thi)004:1941: gang yang yid la ma byas nas //
NK040(thi)004:1942: gol sar lhung ba ci las byung //
NK040(thi)004:1943: bsam med bsgom pas ma nor na //
NK040(thi)004:1944: chos sku byang chub the tshom med //
NK040(thi)004:1945: bsgom gyi nang nas de nyid mchog /
NK040(thi)004:1946: 'du shes rnam par bshig la zhog /
NK040(thi)004:1948: yang blta ba la phyogs ris med pa /
NK040(thi)004:1949: bsgom pa la zhen pa med pa /
NK040(thi)004:1950: spyod pa zhi zhing dul ba'o //
NK040(thi)004:1951: yang na blta ba mtha' dang bral ba /
NK040(thi)004:1953: spyod pa gshis 'gros rang la btang ba'o //
NK040(thi)004:1954: yang na rang ngo shes pa lta ba /
NK040(thi)004:1955: de'i ngang la 'jog pa bsgom pa /
NK040(thi)004:1956: gang la yang nyam nga med pa spyod pa yin /
NK040(thi)004:1957: re dog med cing bstan pa thob pa 'bras bu yin /
NK040(thi)004:1958: bzhi pa bzhag thab bstan pa la gsum gyis /
NK040(thi)004:1959: dang po mnyam bzhag dus bsgom skyong ba ni /
NK040(thi)004:1960: sngar ngo sprod pa'i go ba tsam /
NK040(thi)004:1963: des mi chog pas byang chub ma thob kyis bar du nyams su blangs so //
NK040(thi)004:1964: gom 'dris brten pa thob pa byed dgos pas /
NK040(thi)004:1966: gnyen po brjed med kyi ngang la mnyam par bzhag go //
NK040(thi)004:1967: de yang chos thams cad sems /
NK040(thi)004:1968: sems nam mkha' ltar mtha' dbus med par /
NK040(thi)004:1969: yul cir yang mi dmigs pa las /
NK040(thi)004:1970: blos gang du yang mi 'dzin par bzhag go //
NK040(thi)004:1971: gnyis pa rjes thob sgom skyong bar bya ba ni /
NK040(thi)004:1972: de ltar bsgom pas mnyam bzhag du sgom bzang po yod kyang /
NK040(thi)004:1974: bsgom kor ler lus pa bya ba de yin pas sa lam mi chod do //
NK040(thi)004:1976: mnyam bzhag la mor bsgom pa bas /
NK040(thi)004:1977: rjes thob kyi shes pa dum par bsgom pas dga' /
NK040(thi)004:1979: mnyam bzhag gi bsgom de nyid rjes thob kyis shes
NK040(thi)004:1980: pa gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya la 'jug pa'i
NK040(thi)004:1981: tshe / 'gro chag nyal 'dug bya byed sna tshogs su bsre zhing bsgom par bya ste /
NK040(thi)004:1983: 'gro 'chag nyal dang 'dug par shes bzhin rab tu rten //
NK040(thi)004:1985: de ltar bsgom par mnyam bzhag bzang po de rjes thob tu skyong rgyu 'ong ba yin /
NK040(thi)004:1986: gsum pa zung 'jug tu bsgom skyong bar bya ba ni /
NK040(thi)004:1987: snying rje dang stong nyid mnyam bzhag dang rjes thob 'dres thub na /
NK040(thi)004:1988: zung 'jug gi ngang nas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi don du bsngo ba dang /
NK040(thi)004:1989: smon lam rnam par dag par bya ste /
NK040(thi)004:1991: sems snang ba dngos po ma 'dzin /
NK040(thi)004:1993: ci snang la phyogs ma byed /
NK040(thi)004:1994: gang shar la dgag sgrub ma byed /
NK040(thi)004:1995: re dog gis thag pas ma bcing /
NK040(thi)004:1997: rang lugs la bcas bcos ma byed /
NK040(thi)004:1998: rang chas la gzhan du ma tshol /
NK040(thi)004:1999: da ltar gyi rig pa so ma bcos slad med
NK040(thi)004:2000: pa dwangs sang nge ba 'di ka chos nyid yin
NK040(thi)004:2001: pa la / the tshom med pa ma'i zhal nas gsungs so //
NK040(thi)004:2002: lnga pa 'bras bu'i ngo bo bstan pa ni /
NK040(thi)004:2003: mnyam bzhag dang rjes shes med par nyin mtshan chos
NK040(thi)004:2004: sku'i 'khor yug yeng dang ma yeng med par mnyam
NK040(thi)004:2006: phyi dang nang med par rig pa zang thal gyi
NK040(thi)004:2007: 'khor yug bzang ba dang ngan pa med par thams
NK040(thi)004:2009: sgrib g.yog las grol bas ye shes lnga'i 'khor yug ste /
NK040(thi)004:2011: mthar thug rang sar zin pa'i dus ni /
NK040(thi)004:2012: rnal 'byor lta ba'i sgrog las grol //
NK040(thi)004:2013: rtog dpyod blo'i spros pa zhi //
NK040(thi)004:2014: rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i sgrog las grol //
NK040(thi)004:2015: nyams len blo'i spros pa zhi //
NK040(thi)004:2016: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sgrog las grol //
NK040(thi)004:2017: bya brtsal blo'i spros pa zhi //
NK040(thi)004:2018: rnal 'byor grub mtha'i sgrog las grol //
NK040(thi)004:2021: mtshon byed blo'i spros pa zhi //
NK040(thi)004:2022: rnal 'byor tshig gi sgrog las grol //
NK040(thi)004:2023: tha snyad blo'i spros pa zhi //
NK040(thi)004:2024: rtog pa ye shes mngon du gyur //
NK040(thi)004:2025: sgrib g.yog blo'i mun pa song //
NK040(thi)004:2026: sgrib med ye shes gcer bur shar //
NK040(thi)004:2027: dri med rig pa gcer bur bud //
NK040(thi)004:2028: khyab gdal ye shes phyogs ris med //
NK040(thi)004:2029: rang shar ye shes gsal 'grib med //
NK040(thi)004:2030: 'od gsal la ye shes nyin mtshan med //
NK040(thi)004:2031: rang rig ye shes rgyun chad med //
NK040(thi)004:2032: rkyen gyi mi spyod g.yo ba med //
NK040(thi)004:2033: nyams nga re dogs 'jig skrag med //
NK040(thi)004:2034: 'khor ba'i mtha' las rten du rgyal //
NK040(thi)004:2035: rnal 'byor mtha' ru phyin zhes bya //
NK040(thi)004:2036: rtog pa mngon du gyur ces bya //
NK040(thi)004:2037: mthar thug rang sa zin zhes bya //
NK040(thi)004:2038: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa non bya //
NK040(thi)004:2041: tha mal lus ngag yid gsum dag nas rgyal ba'i sku gsung thugs su 'char /
NK040(thi)004:2042: 'khor 'das kyi rtogs pa thams cad grol nas /
NK040(thi)004:2044: mya ngan 'das pa zhes bya ba yin te /
NK040(thi)004:2046: lus ngag yid gsum dag pa yang //
NK040(thi)004:2047: sku gsum 'bras bu btag pa yin //
NK040(thi)004:2048: 'khor ba rang sar grol ba las //
NK040(thi)004:2049: myang 'das logs su bsgrub rgyu med //
NK040(thi)004:2051: ma cig lab kyi sgron ma de nyid /
NK040(thi)004:2052: mthar thug sku bzhi'i rang chas yin par gsungs ste /
NK040(thi)004:2054: chos sku yum chen pha rol phyin ma'i sku //
NK040(thi)004:2055: longs sku rdo rje rnal 'byor ma yi sku //
NK040(thi)004:2056: sprul sku ma cig lab kyi sgron ma'i sku //
NK040(thi)004:2057: sku gsum dbyer med ngo bo nyid kyi sku //
NK040(thi)004:2058: sku bzhi'i sangs rgyas ma cig lab sgron ma //
NK040(thi)004:2059: lus ngag yid gsum gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
NK040(thi)004:2061: 'di nyid nyams su len pa'i dus su /
NK040(thi)004:2062: rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs thams cad skad cig gi
NK040(thi)004:2063: rang sa nas zhi bar byed pas na zhi byed
NK040(thi)004:2064: ces bya'o // 'di nyams su blangs na /
NK040(thi)004:2065: sa lam bsgrod mi dgos yum gyi klong du phyin
NK040(thi)004:2066: pa la the tshom med pas na phar phyin ces
NK040(thi)004:2067: bya'o // 'di nyams su blangs ba'i dus su /
NK040(thi)004:2068: lus 'dul ba'i ched du gnyan sa 'grim /
NK040(thi)004:2069: ngag 'dul ba'i ched du gsol ba btab /
NK040(thi)004:2070: sems 'dul ba'i ched du mnyam par bzhag pas na 'dul ba zhes bya'o //
NK040(thi)004:2071: thams cad sems su rdzogs pas na rdzogs chen bya'o //
NK040(thi)004:2072: sems bzhi med rtsa bral du gcod pa'i phyir /
NK040(thi)004:2073: phyag rgya chen po gcod ces bya'o //
NK040(thi)004:2074: des dngos gzhi nyams len gyi rim pa de song ngo //
NK040(thi)004:2075: spyi don gsum pa rjes kyi bya ba la gnyis ste /
NK040(thi)004:2076: gcod log pa'i rgyu ngos bzung ba dang /
NK040(thi)004:2077: log non rang gi ngo bo'o //
NK040(thi)004:2079: bla mas gdam ngag gnad 'jug gam /
NK040(thi)004:2080: rang gi nyams len gyi 'jug sgo log pa'am /
NK040(thi)004:2081: lha 'dre ring nas sngar gyi gcod pa rnams kyi kha rgyal du shor ba dang 'phrad dam /
NK040(thi)004:2082: ha cang lha 'dre rgod cing thu drag pa'am /
NK040(thi)004:2083: rang la gnod cing gzhir bzhag tu yod pa'i lha 'dre dang /
NK040(thi)004:2084: gnyan khrod kyi lha 'dre gsar pa gnyis 'thab pa'i shugs rang la phog pa'am /
NK040(thi)004:2085: rang gis gzhan pha rol la gcod gtad log pa byas pa tshur log pa'am /
NK040(thi)004:2086: gnyan khrod 'grim pa'i dus tshar tshad ma rdzogs par
NK040(thi)004:2087: gzhan gcig nas gcig tu 'phos shing gnad kyi gdam
NK040(thi)004:2088: pas ma zin par lha 'dre sna mang gi 'gyur
NK040(thi)004:2089: ldog 'dug gam / yang na dur khrod la sogs
NK040(thi)004:2090: par 'dre rigs mi 'dra ba mang po 'du 'tshogs
NK040(thi)004:2091: ldog 'dug gam / byed pa'i sar / gcod la phyin pas la la chod kyang /
NK040(thi)004:2092: la la ma chod par lus pa'i gzer theb pa'am /
NK040(thi)004:2093: dang po tab tob la gcod kyi chos zhus /
NK040(thi)004:2094: de zhus kyang rting ma rdzogs par dga' la re ba'i shugs dang /
NK040(thi)004:2095: rog gis stabs ka la sogs pas gcod byas nas gnyan khrod 'grim yang /
NK040(thi)004:2096: gdam pa phu thag ma chod pa dang /
NK040(thi)004:2099: lha 'dre ma slong nas gnyan sa bskyur nas log gam /
NK040(thi)004:2100: gnas skabs thun mong gi tshar tshad 'phral la dga' brod skyes sam /
NK040(thi)004:2101: bdud dang lha 'dre'i cho 'phrul gyis lung bstan pa la /
NK040(thi)004:2102: mchog tu bzung nas lung bstan de'i rjes su 'brang byas sam /
NK040(thi)004:2103: snying rus zhe bcad chung ngam /
NK040(thi)004:2104: lha 'dre drag po'i cho 'phrul gyis 'khyams nas snyem ma thub pa'am /
NK040(thi)004:2105: gnyan khrod brten go la dbang med gzhan du 'gro dgos pa'am /
NK040(thi)004:2106: byang chub bsgrub pa'i lam mkhan bla ma yin pa la /
NK040(thi)004:2107: dad pa ma skyes par log lta skyes na log /
NK040(thi)004:2108: lha 'dre la sogs sems can thams cad rang gi pha mar ma gyur pa med pa la /
NK040(thi)004:2109: phan thog gang nus ma byas par rang 'dod kyis gnod cing 'tshe ba'i bsam sbyor byas na log /
NK040(thi)004:2110: dal 'byor bac+wa brgyad kyi mi lus thob pa ni
NK040(thi)004:2111: der brtson 'grus dang ldan pas byang chub bsgrub cing
NK040(thi)004:2112: snying po len pa la 'bad pa gal che yang
NK040(thi)004:2113: / le lo shor nas btang snyom du lus pa'am /
NK040(thi)004:2115: tshe 'di'i bya ba byas na log /
NK040(thi)004:2116: 'khor 'das gnyis kyi bar du snyem the tshom ngar
NK040(thi)004:2117: 'dzin las bdud che ba med pa la snyems the
NK040(thi)004:2118: tshom gnyis 'dzin gyi 'khri ba ma chod na log
NK040(thi)004:2119: / khyad par du gcod kyi lugs kyi gdam pa
NK040(thi)004:2120: nyams su len pa'i thog mar byams snying rje byang
NK040(thi)004:2121: chub kyi sems ma bsgom na /
NK040(thi)004:2122: lha 'dre'i cho 'phrul la khro gtum byed cing /
NK040(thi)004:2123: rang gi lus ngag yid gsum ma slong ba'i rnam pa mi bde ba byung ba la /
NK040(thi)004:2124: de la log non du ming btang cing /
NK040(thi)004:2125: lha 'dre la ci gnod kyis dmigs pa dang /
NK040(thi)004:2126: sa rko rdo barloga brag gshig chu dkrug la sogs ci thub chod kyi spyod pa byas na log /
NK040(thi)004:2127: re dog gi mdun ma khong du bcug na log /
NK040(thi)004:2128: gdam pa la khu 'khrig dang the tshom zhugs na log /
NK040(thi)004:2129: mdor na sems la rtog pa khu 'khrig gnyis 'dzin
NK040(thi)004:2130: zhugs cing snyem ma chod pa la brten nas gcod
NK040(thi)004:2131: log go // lus ngag yid gnyis kyi rgyud la
NK040(thi)004:2132: na tsha zug gzer brda bsnol sogs mi bde ba
NK040(thi)004:2133: log go // mang po dang / rkyen phyi nang bar chad sna tshogs 'byung zhing che ste /
NK040(thi)004:2136: tha ma yang tshe 'dir mi bde ba sna tshogs 'byung /
NK040(thi)004:2137: gnas skabs su yang ci bsam mi 'grub par log
NK040(thi)004:2138: 'gyu du ma bskyed pa la sogs gcod log pa'i
NK040(thi)004:2140: de'i log gnon gyi man ngag la gnyis ste /
NK040(thi)004:2141: dang po snga tshags su tshud par bya ba'i phyir thab sgo gtan 'gegs pa lta bu dang /
NK040(thi)004:2142: gnyis pa snga tshags su ma tshud par byung ngam /
NK040(thi)004:2143: tshud kyang ma thub par byung na /
NK040(thi)004:2144: log non gnam lcags kyi gzer mda' brdeg pa lta bu'i gnad kyi man ngag go //
NK040(thi)004:2145: dang po snga tshags su 'dzug pa sgo them brdeg pa lta bu ni /
NK040(thi)004:2146: dper na dgra rkun 'byung gi dog pa ni /
NK040(thi)004:2147: ma byung ba'i gong na sgo'i 'den bu rgyang 'den gyi mnan pa dang /
NK040(thi)004:2149: 'gag sdom pa la sogs pa zon byas pa dang /
NK040(thi)004:2150: dgra rkun gyis kyang de rig nas de'i phyogs su mi 'ong zhing /
NK040(thi)004:2151: gal te mi 'ong yang glag mi rnyed pa dang mtshungs par /
NK040(thi)004:2152: 'dir yang thog mar nyams len la snga thog nas 'jug pa'i sngon du /
NK040(thi)004:2153: lta ba thag chod spyi chabs kyi man ngag dang
NK040(thi)004:2154: ldan par byas pas stong pa nyid kyis stong pa
NK040(thi)004:2155: nyid la glag mi rnyed do //
NK040(thi)004:2156: rgyal ba'i yum las stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glag mi rnyed do //
NK040(thi)004:2157: mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glag mi rnyed do //
NK040(thi)004:2158: smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glag mi rnyed do //
NK040(thi)004:2160: snga tshags su shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha dang ldan par byed pa'o //
NK040(thi)004:2161: de yang 'di ltar bdag nyid nyams su len mkhan gyi rnal 'byor mi dmigs /
NK040(thi)004:2162: nyams su blang bar bya ba'i chos mi dmigs /
NK040(thi)004:2163: nyams su len pa'i sa phyogs gnyan khrod mi dmigs /
NK040(thi)004:2164: yul ris sa phyogs der gnas pa'i lha 'dre gzhi bdag la sogs mi dmigs /
NK040(thi)004:2166: thams cad mi dmigs pa dang bral bas /
NK040(thi)004:2167: gang la'ang bden par grub pa med pa ste /
NK040(thi)004:2168: snang srid 'khor 'das kyis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad bdag med pa'o //
NK040(thi)004:2169: gnyis pa snga tshags su ma tshud pa'am tshud kyang log pa la sogs pa gcod log byung na /
NK040(thi)004:2170: log non gnam lcags kyis gzer mda' brdeg pa'i man ngag ni /
NK040(thi)004:2171: snang srid lha 'dre ma rung ba'i cho 'phrul rtsub
NK040(thi)004:2172: 'gyur gyi ltas dngos sam rmi lam la sogs par
NK040(thi)004:2173: che 'bring chung gsum brjod las 'das pa 'byung bar
NK040(thi)004:2174: 'gyur ste / de ltar ci byung yang rnal 'byor
NK040(thi)004:2175: pa rab kyis rab snang srid 'khor 'das kyi chos
NK040(thi)004:2176: 'gyur ste / thams cad / yid la byar med cing snyam pa'i ngang la lhan ne bzhag pas /
NK040(thi)004:2177: bdag gzhan cho 'phrul la sogs thams cad sdug bsngal
NK040(thi)004:2178: dang bral ba'i nam mkha' dwangs ba ltar rtog par
NK040(thi)004:2179: 'gyur / rab kyis 'bring pos bdag dang lha 'dre'i
NK040(thi)004:2180: cho 'phrul thams cad grub pa med pa'i dbyings su
NK040(thi)004:2182: bdag gces pas sems can thams cad kyi rtog pas
NK040(thi)004:2183: sems kyi ngo bo stong pa nam mkha' lta bu
NK040(thi)004:2184: rang bzhin gsal la chu zla lta bu /
NK040(thi)004:2185: mtshan 'dzin las 'das pa bar snang du rlung 'phyo ba lta bu /
NK040(thi)004:2186: de dag thams cad kyang sems nyid stong pa'i rang
NK040(thi)004:2187: rtsal du shes pa rang sar grol na bdag ma
NK040(thi)004:2188: grub pa'o // lha 'dre zhes pa phyi rol ga ge mo zhig nas byung ba ma yin zhing /
NK040(thi)004:2189: rang gis sems kyi rnam rol gyi gdang phyir 'char ba ni /
NK040(thi)004:2190: dper na khang pa'i nang du me 'bar ba'i 'od
NK040(thi)004:2191: phyir gsal ba dang mtshungs pas lha 'dre ma grub
NK040(thi)004:2192: pa'o // cho 'phrul zang zing ni rang sar 'khrul pa ste /
NK040(thi)004:2193: gzhan nas 'byung phyir 'char ba ma yin /
NK040(thi)004:2194: dper na snang ba 'gyur byed kyi rdzas khong du song bas /
NK040(thi)004:2195: med pa la yod par 'dzin pa'i snang ba 'khrul pa dang mtshungs pa'i phyir cho 'phrul ma grub /
NK040(thi)004:2196: de ltar gang yang grub pa med pa'i phyir /
NK040(thi)004:2197: yod 'dzin gyi blo dang bral ba'i stong nyid kyi ngo bo la lta'o //
NK040(thi)004:2198: de nas bdag dang lha 'dre cho 'phrul gsum dbyer
NK040(thi)004:2199: med gcig tu rtog cing blo thag chod par 'gyur
NK040(thi)004:2200: ro // rab kyi tha mas phata ces /
NK040(thi)004:2201: des cho 'phrul thams cad nam mkha'i skar tshogs mi snang ba ltar du gyur nas /
NK040(thi)004:2202: lus ngag yid gsum bde lhan gyi song nas /
NK040(thi)004:2203: rtog pa khyad par can rgyud la skye'o //
NK040(thi)004:2204: rnal 'byor pa 'bring gis rab kyi dbang po lus
NK040(thi)004:2205: kyi mngon zhan mig gis yul du gzugs bzang ba
NK040(thi)004:2206: la sogs pa la chags pa dang /
NK040(thi)004:2207: ma legs pa la sdang ba dang /
NK040(thi)004:2208: des 'dres par legs nyes chags sdang lha 'dre la
NK040(thi)004:2209: yang de bzhin cho 'phrul bzang po ston pa la
NK040(thi)004:2210: yang chag ngan pa ston pa la yang sdang /
NK040(thi)004:2211: cho 'phrul ma byung na byung na snyam pa dang /
NK040(thi)004:2212: byung na skrag cing 'di lta bu byung na dga' ba la snyam pa la sogs /
NK040(thi)004:2213: re dog nyin mtshan 'jig snang thams cad kyi ngo bo rang bzhin shes par bya ste /
NK040(thi)004:2214: chu nang gis gzugs skar bkra ba la /
NK040(thi)004:2215: ngos bzung dang bral ba ltar ci mi snyams du bzhag /
NK040(thi)004:2216: des cho 'phrul tshar du slong nas /
NK040(thi)004:2217: mchog gi dngos grub dang thun mong gi dngos grub gnyis ka 'byung /
NK040(thi)004:2218: 'bring gis 'bring pos cho 'phrul la sogs thams cad phug legs par btag /
NK040(thi)004:2220: kho la nga byung 'on te gnyis ka dus gcig la byung na byung mkhan dang /
NK040(thi)004:2221: byung ba de'i rang bzhin dang /
NK040(thi)004:2222: byung ba de'i rgyu las grub /
NK040(thi)004:2225: de dag gis mtshan nyid de legs par brtag pa bzhin /
NK040(thi)004:2226: thams cad rang bzhin med par dper na nam mkha'i ri mo bzhin /
NK040(thi)004:2227: phyad kyis song nas gang la yang snying po mi
NK040(thi)004:2228: 'dug snyam pa'i thag chod kyi nyams 'char bar 'gyur
NK040(thi)004:2229: / des thun mong gis dngos grub char ltar 'bebs /
NK040(thi)004:2230: mchog gi dngos grub rnyed pa'i ltas 'byung /
NK040(thi)004:2231: de ltar lam rtag gi yon tan gang byung yang /
NK040(thi)004:2232: de la barloma pa dang dga' brod gang yang mi bskyed /
NK040(thi)004:2233: gal te bskyed na snga ma'i rgyu mtshan med par
NK040(thi)004:2234: bskyur de ltar ma bskyur na nad la phan du
NK040(thi)004:2236: sman de nyid kyang sman log du song nas nad
NK040(thi)004:2237: ma drag pa'i steng du 'chi bar 'gyur ba bzhin
NK040(thi)004:2238: no // 'bring gi tha mas 'di snyam du ga
NK040(thi)004:2239: re nga 'dir phyin chos 'di snyam du blang na
NK040(thi)004:2240: no // / 'di 'dra ba'i cho 'phrul la sogs mi bde ba'i zang zing 'ong don med /
NK040(thi)004:2241: 'di byung ba'i rgyu nga rang gis byas /
NK040(thi)004:2242: rkyen phyi nang gis yul yul can du 'phro /
NK040(thi)004:2243: dper na 'byung ba tsha grang 'thab pa la sgra 'byung ba dang 'dra /
NK040(thi)004:2244: rgyu rkyen thams cad rang la thugs par 'dug bsam du zhib mo bsam pas /
NK040(thi)004:2245: thams cad rang la byung bas ngo shes /
NK040(thi)004:2246: 'o na rang gi mtshan nyid ci 'dra sems kyi
NK040(thi)004:2247: brtsad gdar bcad pas sems kyi mtshan nyid rtog nas
NK040(thi)004:2248: bdud rang chod cho 'phrul rang zhir 'gro zhing lha
NK040(thi)004:2249: 'dre thams cad kyang bran 'khor du 'gyur nas gnod
NK040(thi)004:2250: mi bskyal ba ni lta ci smos /
NK040(thi)004:2251: ci smra ba'i bka' la nyan zhing chos skyong du 'gyur ro //
NK040(thi)004:2252: rnal 'byor pa tha ma'i rab kyis /
NK040(thi)004:2253: sngar gyi gnyan sa la sogs nyes pa byung ba'i
NK040(thi)004:2254: le len gyi sa gnas de nyid du phyin pa'am
NK040(thi)004:2255: / gal te der ma sleb na de dang cha mthun gyi gnas gang 'thad du phyin la /
NK040(thi)004:2256: dang po gzhung ltar nyams su blang cing /
NK040(thi)004:2257: khyad par gnod byed des thog drangs ba'i sems can
NK040(thi)004:2258: thams cad la byams snying rje shas mi bzod pa
NK040(thi)004:2259: sgom la bya / snying rjer 'gyur ba'i gnod byed
NK040(thi)004:2260: thog drangs ba'i sems can thams cad la bdag gi
NK040(thi)004:2261: lus ngag yid gsum gang la ci 'dod du sbyin
NK040(thi)004:2262: pa bzang bas so sor ci 'dod du khyer la
NK040(thi)004:2263: longs spyod cig snyam du snying thag pa nas bsam
NK040(thi)004:2265: rjes la phyi nang snod bcud thams cad stong pa nyid du rgyas gdab /
NK040(thi)004:2266: de ltar thun grangs stong rtsa la sogs slong dang bya /
NK040(thi)004:2267: des cho 'phrul nyal gyi zhi nas bde phyam gyis 'gro /
NK040(thi)004:2268: dge sbyor ngang gis 'phel zhing bzod pa'i go cha thob par 'gyur ro //
NK040(thi)004:2272: ya nga na ya thog tu btang /
NK040(thi)004:2273: skyug bro na bro thog tu btang /
NK040(thi)004:2274: gang mi phod pa la thog barjisa su btang zhing /
NK040(thi)004:2275: me btsa' an tshugs su brdeg par bya ste /
NK040(thi)004:2276: de yang dper na nad kyis gzer dmigs gar yod
NK040(thi)004:2277: du sman pa mkhas pas nad che zhing ma chog
NK040(thi)004:2278: pas / slar me btsa' brdeg pa bzhin du /
NK040(thi)004:2279: nad tsha ba la bcos thabs tsha ba nyid brten
NK040(thi)004:2280: nad grang ba la bcos thabs grang ba nyid brten
NK040(thi)004:2281: / spyod lam yang de'i mtshon par bya zhing /
NK040(thi)004:2282: khyod na ba bas kyang thu ba 'chi bar chug /
NK040(thi)004:2285: snyam pa'i ngang la blo snyam snyam med par lus bdag po med pa khong stong ltar bor /
NK040(thi)004:2286: sems stong pa'i ngang nas dbyings rig bsre /
NK040(thi)004:2287: gdon la thog 'gel byed pa ni /
NK040(thi)004:2288: gdon 'di rnams bdag gi drin chen gyi pha ma yin /
NK040(thi)004:2289: cho 'phrul la sogs pa mi bde ba 'di rnams ni /
NK040(thi)004:2290: bdag nyes kyi dog 'khor bar 'khyams kyi dog pa'i
NK040(thi)004:2291: slong yin snyam pa'i ngang nas ma drin chen gyi
NK040(thi)004:2292: brda' la nyan / ma pang bu 'agro'o snyam pa'i ngang nas /
NK040(thi)004:2293: gdon gang yin pa de'i pang du 'chang /
NK040(thi)004:2294: de'i kha nas zhugs nas kho yi khog par yang yod snyam par bya /
NK040(thi)004:2295: yang drin len bsab pa'i ched du /
NK040(thi)004:2296: rang lus bdud rtsir byin gyis brlab la /
NK040(thi)004:2297: gang la ci 'dod du sbyin pa btang /
NK040(thi)004:2298: de dang mthun pa spyod lam yang lha 'dre'i don du bya /
NK040(thi)004:2299: lus kyi ci nus kyi phyag 'tshal ba dang /
NK040(thi)004:2303: sats+tsha btab pa la sogs pa'i chos spyod la 'bad /
NK040(thi)004:2304: rang gi lus kyi ma nus na /
NK040(thi)004:2305: grogs po la sogs la byed bcug /
NK040(thi)004:2306: rang gi don du rim gro byed pa'i dod po de lha 'dre la bsngo /
NK040(thi)004:2307: de'i rjes la dmigs med kyi rgyas gdab /
NK040(thi)004:2308: ya nga na nga thog tu btang ba ni /
NK040(thi)004:2310: nga gcig pur 'khor bar 'khyams na ci yin /
NK040(thi)004:2311: 'di rnams sdug bsngal gyi mnar na /
NK040(thi)004:2312: nga gcig pur sdug bsngal ci nyes /
NK040(thi)004:2313: sems can 'di rnams thams cad kyi don du /
NK040(thi)004:2314: bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum glud du bsngo ba la 'gro snyam pa'i 'dun pa dang ldan pas /
NK040(thi)004:2315: yang nga ba dang bag tsha ba dang gang byung
NK040(thi)004:2316: ba la mi bros par slar de ka la 'dug
NK040(thi)004:2317: de phata bya / ces gsob dang lam blar shes par byas la /
NK040(thi)004:2318: lus ngag yid gsum shing bcad pa'i sdong po 'gyel ba ltar khram bskyur bar bya'o //
NK040(thi)004:2319: skyug bro na bro thog tu btang ba ni /
NK040(thi)004:2320: gang skyug bro bas mi gtsang ba'am /
NK040(thi)004:2322: gos rol la sogs yid yul du gang skyug bro
NK040(thi)004:2323: ba'i steng du snyem zhugs pa de ka ched du
NK040(thi)004:2324: gnyer la / bza' btung gos sogs longs spyod de
NK040(thi)004:2325: skyug bro na skyug pa slar 'thung zhing rjes su
NK040(thi)004:2326: ci yang mi dmigs pa'i ngang du bskyur bar bya'o
NK040(thi)004:2327: gnyer la / // mi phod pa la thog rdzis btang ba ni /
NK040(thi)004:2328: lus ngag yid gsum gyis spyod pa rbad chod rbud chod la btang /
NK040(thi)004:2329: lha 'dre mi gsum la sogs gang mi phod cing /
NK040(thi)004:2330: the tshom dang snyem zhugs pa de nyid kyis dus rtog pa sna mi bskyil bar /
NK040(thi)004:2331: nyams byung rgyal du btang la gang la chags pa de spang sdang ba de dang du blang /
NK040(thi)004:2332: mdor na gnyis 'dzin gyi mdud pa bshig la /
NK040(thi)004:2333: snang ba thams cad thad kar bcad la bzhag /
NK040(thi)004:2334: de rnams byas pas bdud lam du slong /
NK040(thi)004:2341: byang chub kyis go 'phang rnyed par 'gyur ro //
NK040(thi)004:2343: dang po lha 'dre thams cad drin chen gyi pha mar bsgom la /
NK040(thi)004:2344: byams snying rje thun mong ma yin par bsgom zhing /
NK040(thi)004:2346: bar du lha 'dre dang bla ma dbyer med du spyi bor bsgom zhing /
NK040(thi)004:2348: dad pa mos gus kyi gdung ba drag po bskyed la /
NK040(thi)004:2350: mthar rang dang lha 'dre gnyis su med par bsrel /
NK040(thi)004:2351: ci yang mi bsam mi gnang ngo //
NK040(thi)004:2352: byar med kyi ngang la mnyam par bzhag /
NK040(thi)004:2353: res 'ga' lha 'dre dang yi dam gyi lha gnyis su med par snying gi dkyil du bsgom la /
NK040(thi)004:2354: rang gi yi dam gyi bzlas pas 'dzab dbyangs su gyer /
NK040(thi)004:2355: res 'ga' snang srid lha 'dre'i rang bzhin du gyur pa de la /
NK040(thi)004:2356: rang gis lus re rer sprul la ci bder longs spyod par dmigs /
NK040(thi)004:2357: res 'ga' lha 'dre'i khang pa gnas la sogs pa'i pho brang rang gis sgar btab /
NK040(thi)004:2358: res 'ga' rang gis gnas mal dang khang par lha 'dre'i pho brang bcas par dmigs /
NK040(thi)004:2360: de la sogs pa'i dmigs pa'i sprul bsgyur mang po bya zhing lus ngag gi longs spyod /
NK040(thi)004:2361: de ltar snyam med par yang yang byas pas zhag
NK040(thi)004:2362: kha yar nas cho 'phrul tshar tshad du 'gyur nas
NK040(thi)004:2365: skyel ma dgra la bcol bas grog gi dam par 'gyur /
NK040(thi)004:2366: nad pa 'dre la gtad pas srung ba'i mchog tu gyur /
NK040(thi)004:2367: bdud rtsi'i dong por dug 'thung bas 'chi med tshe yi rig 'dzin brnyes /
NK040(thi)004:2369: gzhan don byas pas rang don zhor la 'grub /
NK040(thi)004:2370: nyon mongs pa ye shes su 'char /
NK040(thi)004:2371: 'khor 'das thams cad khyab gdal du ma ro gcig tu rtog pas lus la bde ba rgyas /
NK040(thi)004:2374: 'dun ma rtse mo byung rgyal du gyur pa'o //
NK040(thi)004:2375: de rnams gang yang dang po sems skye med kyi rtsis bzung ba dang /
NK040(thi)004:2376: bar du stong nyid snying rjes rgyas theb pa dang /
NK040(thi)004:2377: mthar 'khor gsum mi dmigs pa'i ngang nas bsngo smon gyis rgyas theb par bya /
NK040(thi)004:2378: mdor na gcod bya gcod byed thams cad la 'du
NK040(thi)004:2379: shes ther zug 'khrul pa'i blang dor re dog gnyis
NK040(thi)004:2380: 'dzin ma zhugs par gcig chod rang grol gyis ngang
NK040(thi)004:2381: du mtshan ma'i rtsol ba dang bral bar bya'o //
NK040(thi)004:2382: de ltar nyams su blang pas gcod log la yang log gi sleb nas /
NK040(thi)004:2383: cho 'phrul rang sar zhi bdud bzhi rang grol du 'gyur ro //
NK040(thi)004:2384: nad la sogs pa'i mi bde ba thams cad bde bar 'gyur /
NK040(thi)004:2387: bka' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dgongs don khong du chud de /
NK040(thi)004:2388: snying po gtan la pheb par 'gyur ro //
NK040(thi)004:2389: ces pad+ma'i gter gcod las gsungs so //
NK040(thi)004:2390: gcod khrid 'di la rgyas pa ltar yin na /
NK040(thi)004:2391: bshad mdzod chen mos byed la bshad do //
NK040(thi)004:2392: bsdus pa ltar yin na rang gzhung gcod khrid 'di dag gis chog go //
NK040(thi)004:2393: des rjes kyi rim de song ngo //
NK040(thi)004:2394: de ltar legs bshad sprin gyi bla bre las //
NK040(thi)004:2395: tshigs don gsal ba'i char pas rab brlan cing //
NK040(thi)004:2396: ma lus 'gro ba'i lo thog rgyas mdzad de //
NK040(thi)004:2397: kun kyang kun tu bzang mo rtog par shog /
NK040(thi)004:2398: dge ba 'di yi srid pa'i sems can kun //
NK040(thi)004:2399: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor dag tu rab zhugs te //
NK040(thi)004:2400: ma lus thams cad byang chub mchog thob nas //
NK040(thi)004:2401: 'gro ba don gnyis lhun gyis grub par shog /
NK040(thi)004:2402: gcod khrid 'di la rang bzo dang pho tshod ma 'dres shing /
NK040(thi)004:2403: tshad gsum zung du 'brel ba'i don ni /
NK040(thi)004:2404: sras rgyal ba don 'grub kyis gcod khrid /
NK040(thi)004:2405: zab don thugs snying gi gcod khrid /
NK040(thi)004:2406: sangs rgyas gnyan ston gyi gcod khrid /
NK040(thi)004:2407: 'dor ba kun dga' dpal ba'i gcod khrid /
NK040(thi)004:2409: drung chos dor ba'i sems tshol ngo sprod de rnams dang /
NK040(thi)004:2410: bla ma dam pa'i man ngag rnams la brten nas /
NK040(thi)004:2411: gcod khrid gsal ba'i sgron me zhes bya ba 'di /
NK040(thi)004:2412: ri khri la g.yu rtse'i zhol /
NK040(thi)004:2413: dngul zla chu klong gi g.yas zur /
NK040(thi)004:2414: slong chen ngos kyi ri khrod nas /
NK040(thi)004:2415: pu ne klag shas sbyar ba re zhig rdzogs so ////
NK040(thi)004:2416: shes bya mtha' bral ka dag chos kyi sku //
NK040(thi)004:2417: rang rig gsal snang lhun grub longs spyod rdzogs //
NK040(thi)004:2418: dbyer med gsal snang du ma sprul par shar //
NK040(thi)004:2419: nges med gcig rdzogs ngo bo nyid kyi sku //
NK040(thi)004:2420: dbyer med ngo bo nyid sku bla mar 'dud //
NK040(thi)004:2421: gdod nas ma skyes 'gags med bsoda namsa rdzogs //
NK040(thi)004:2422: yon tan dapala bzhin nam mkha'i mtha' bzhin rgyas //
NK040(thi)004:2423: don gnyis lhun grub chos sgo 'bum phrag gis //
NK040(thi)004:2424: phrin las bzhi 'byung 'gro ba dpag med 'dren //
NK040(thi)004:2425: bdud kyi gcod yul pha rol phyin don gyis //
NK040(thi)004:2426: mi mthun bdud bzhi'i dgra las rgyal mdzad pa //
NK040(thi)004:2427: 'gro ba bdud las skyob pa'i mnga' bo che //
NK040(thi)004:2428: bdud 'dul dpa' bo dpa' mo chen po la //
NK040(thi)004:2429: ldog med don ldan dkon mchog pha ma yi //
NK040(thi)004:2430: 'gyur med mos ldan brtse gcig dad chen pos //
NK040(thi)004:2431: 'bral med mtshan ldan gyi dwangs mi phyed nas //
NK040(thi)004:2432: don gnyis 'chug med chen pos don mdzad shog /
NK040(thi)004:2434: gtsang nyang stod rgya rtse'i lha gzhis gzim lbug na /
NK040(thi)004:2435: ngag dbang bstan 'dzin rnam rgyal phyag dpe kahsi rin
NK040(thi)004:2436: po che chos kyi rgya mtsho'i kahthoga dpe mdzod du
NK040(thi)004:2437: bzhugs su gsol ba dang dpe bsdur sa man+ta ma
